*Brasil com S*
https://twitter.com/brasilwithsnft

*Coletivo Oyxabaten*
https://twitter.com/lucianoducirilo
https://twitter.com/oyxabaten

IberoAm Online Conference Program (August 26-27th):
https://iberoam.xyz/wp-content/uploads/2022/08/iberoam-conference-program.pdf

**Our 4 main achievements in Q1 2023 were:**

(i) We successfully organized a disrupting IRL event to onboard scientists, data privacy advocates and social impact leaders on the blockchain ecosystem called "From Genomes and Privacy to Social Impact using Blockchain" funded by Eth-Colombia and Clr.fund. The whole event was recorded and is publicly available (to serve as an educational resource) at the Technological Park of the Federal University of Rio de Janeiro youtube channel:

https://www.youtube.com/live/FxnJ-pJgRsU?feature=share

(ii) Participated as speakers in the first ever Decentralized Science (DeSci) panel organized by Ethrereum Brazil in the Ethereum Rio 2023 conference (https://www.ethereumbrasil.com/ethereumrio).

(iii) We also successfully organised the first ever Decentralized Science (DeSci) event in Brazil called DeSci Rio (https://iberoam.xyz/?page_id=582) having DeSci World (https://desci.world/), DeSci Latam (https://linktr.ee/descilatam), Ibmec (https://www.ibmec.br/) and Favelaverso(https://linktr.ee/favelaverso) as partners.

(iv) A meetup with students of the Computing Institute (https://www.dcc.ufrj.br/) at the Federal University of Rio de Janeiro (https://ufrj.br/en/) was organized in March 30th, having as speaker Steph Orpilla from Polygon Labs and to talk about "Intro to the Polygon Ecosystem and Polygon zkEVM"

**The pics composing the banner in this project page summarize our main activities to date**

column16:
# An Open-Source Game to Popularize Web3

FBH is an education project that makes sci-fi content about complexity of the modern world to make it more accessible and understandable for everyone. 
Our ultimate goal is to generate widespread attention and excitement for ideas like: web3, refi, regen/degen, desci, despace, DAOs, etc. By creating engaging stories and games in the science fiction genre and using game mechanics and narrative, we are engaging people in the new economy in a fun and enjoyable manner.


The project is run by a group of three passionate individuals who use open-source software to create captivating stories that are available to all.


***Check our video for the game on [Youtube](https://youtu.be/AYJo50ySMH8)***



## Project Progress

*  Developed sprites characters, background, music, and script for our game (over 60k words). 
* Our Twitter account has over 4k followers
* 80+ donations worth ~$3k on [GR15](https://gitcoin.co/grants/7851/follow-the-black-hare-an-open-source-game-to-popularize-web3) and Gitcoin.co, 
* 17 donations worth ~$2000 and ~90k GIVPOWER on [Giveth](https://giveth.io/project/follow-the-black-hare)
* Consistently release new content, including weekly articles and starting monthly sci-fi stories in our Web3 LOR on [Mirror](https://mirror.xyz/0x7587Cfbd20E5A970209526b4D1f69dBAae8Bed37), and 
* We are starting monthly updates for our game's prototype. 

## Community

* Participated in the Hackathon for [G7 and Rensa](https://github.com/H1na/FBH-G7-game), 
* Members of the Solarpunk Guild and G7 DAO, 
* ReFi DAO [projects of the week](https://twitter.com/Linggih_ngurah/status/1625942544940146688).
* [Lecture](https://twitter.com/stia_me/status/1638092016155521029) about Gitcoin and Web3 to founders of public good projects
* [Poap](https://www.poap.delivery/follow-the-black-hare) for supporters GR15

## Get Involved

We invite you to follow our progress and join us in the world of Web3 by:
* Following us on [Twitter](https://twitter.com/FollowBlackHare)
* Visiting our [founder's Twitter](https://twitter.com/stia_me)
* Joining our [Discord](https://discord.gg/tqRWmHMS)
* Checking out our [GitHub](https://github.com/H1na)

We provide free classes, resources, tools, and other informational material to the community so that they can prevent themselves from becoming the next victim.

column15: Social Impact - Through Culturally Rich Web3 Gaming & Entertainment
column16:
# Social Impact in motion #
The start-up world is not equal for all, too often opportunity comes to those born into more fortunate situations (through no fault of those on the receiving end). 

**Wouldn‚Äôt the world benefit greatly if Web3 ecosystems could help level the playing field?**
Grow is a multi-cultural collective of talent that aims to promote culture, diversity, and community empowerment within Web3. We are dedicated to diversifying the Web3 industry by providing a platform for creative talent of all backgrounds to express themselves. Building opportunity and community where it can have the biggest impact on society.
For the last two years, without the support of Venture Capital, we have bootstrapped and built Grow to a team of 45 amazingly talented creatives, blockchain developers and game developers.

Now we need the support of Web3 to scale our efforts as we look to provide a platform for little understood cultures, to tell the rich stories, mythologies and fables of their people.
![Grow Studio is home to those who have talent but few opportunities](https://d.img.vision/growstudio/photo_collage_-_desktop_wallpaper.png)

## Diversifying Opportunity in Web3 ##
We are committed to creating an inclusive opportunity for traditionally overlooked talent by providing equal access to resources and support - enabling more people to get involved in the industry and contribute to the growth of the Web3 community.
At Grow, we embrace diversity by incorporating the different cultural perspectives of our team into our creative process. Our goal is to cultivate a Web3 community that is reflective of merged cultures and values that resonate with a global audience.
Web3 communities are built on the principles of decentralization, transparency, and shared ownership. They serve a purpose beyond just financial gain. The decentralized nature of Web3 allows the creation of unique and innovative experiences that can empower communities and foster real social impact.
![Grow Studio is for diversity, opportunity and Web3 community.](https://d.img.vision/growstudio/GrowColombo.jpg)



# Our Strategy #

Social impact is not just a buzzword or a nice-to-have feature of a Web3 community; it is a fundamental aspect that drives engagement, loyalty, and growth.
We have identified 4 key areas;
**Community engagement**: Social impact is a powerful motivator for community members to engage with the community and contribute to its growth. In developing countries like Sri Lanka and the Philippines, where communities may feel marginalized or lack access resources, a shared sense of purpose and meaning can be particularly impactful. When community members feel that they are part of something larger than themselves and are making a positive difference in the world, they are more likely to stay engaged and remain emotionally invested in the community's success.
**Network effects**: Social impact can attract new members to the community who share the same values and are interested in making a positive difference. As more people join the community, the ‚Äòvalue‚Äô of the community increases, creating a virtuous cycle of growth and impact. Where there is evidence of a lack of social infrastructure, the development of Web3 communities can provide an important avenue for individuals to connect with like-minded people and build a sense of belonging.
 **Brand reputation**: By demonstrating a commitment to social impact, a Web3 community can enhance its brand reputation and differentiate itself from competitors. This can be particularly important in countries like Sri Lanka, where there is a lack of trust in traditional institutions. A strong brand reputation can help a Web3 community attract new members and partnerships, which can fuel further growth and impact.
**Long-term sustainability**: Social impact is essential for the long-term sustainability of a Web3 community. Communities that are focused solely on financial gain are more vulnerable to market fluctuations and shifts in sentiment. In contrast, communities that are built on a strong social foundation are more resilient. Sri Lanka is a country where economic and political instability is common, therefore, focussing on sustainability can help ensure the long-term success of a Web3 community.
![Rising to the challenge, smiling along the way](https://d.img.vision/growstudio/growcrew.png)

## Web3 Powered Cultural Rich Entertainment ##

We are building Web3 products that promote cultures that haven't previously had a voice! The first being a game focused on Sri Lankan + Indian mythology, authentic content built by authentic people. 

![A Web3 gaming title with substance](https://d.img.vision/growstudio/website.png)

We have self-funded the building of in-house web3 products for the past 18 months and are almost ready to launch our very own game, Mindborn Sons, the game is set in the beautiful lush world of ancient Lanka and allows players to learn about this fascinating mythology that has not been told on a global stage before.
The majority of games within the Web3 space lack emotional depth in the form of lore. This is also true for some traditional MOBA games. Following trends and designing games around the trending gameplay mechanics or tokenomics often results in story being an afterthought, limited to general setting for the conflict and character backgrounds.
The MBS canon is based on years of research into South Asian culture, history, folklore, myths, legends, and beliefs. Unlike ancient Greek, Roman or Nordic legends, the rich history of South Asia and its culture remains largely untapped within gaming, resulting in a lore that is not only rich and engaging, but unique in focus, fresh, and appealing to a global audience. 
By allowing the players to develop and shape the lore as they play, MBS ensures continuous growth of the world it inhabits, allowing community-driven content to take center stage and paving the way for the creation of other media, such as comic books, novels, animated videos, and movies. 
To facilitate and encourage this level of player and creator participation, MBS will use Narraio within the game‚Äôs ecosystem, thereby accelerating content generation, providing an accessible method of creation for all technological skill levels, and an easy way for rewarding all contributors.


![A Web3 gaming title with substance](https://d.img.vision/growstudio/mindbornmontage.png)
**We hope you will join the tribe!**
mindbornsons.com
We have tried our level best to build this game all the way to playable demo without selling tokens or NFT‚Äôs, an ethical approach but a difficult one, we are on track to have the demo complete in May and grant funding will aid us in taking it to market.

**We are eternally grateful for any support provided!**

Thank you for your time, I will leave you with some examples of our efforts to support the growth of Web3 and entrepreneurial spirit in regions that need it most.

## Some examples of our ‚Äúboots on the ground‚Äù approach to community development: ##

# EDUCATION #
Web3 enables community members to have greater control over their interactions and the content they consume. However, building a strong and sustainable community requires more than just technological infrastructure. It requires a thoughtful approach to education.
Education is critical to Web3 community building; it helps to break down barriers to entry and promotes diversity. By providing access to educational resources, we are committed to help ensure more individuals can participate in Web3 communities.
We recognize the importance of education, our teams Nine Hermits and Perfectus have hosted workshops and seminars that provide people with the basic knowledge of Web3 technology ‚Äì whilst also expanding their knowledge in relation to its various applications.
Through education, talent acquisition, and creative expression, we are laying the foundation of a sustainable Web3 community that is reflective of the diverse perspectives and values of its members.
An example of this is a seminar we held in March in Colombo, Sri Lanka - ‚ÄòBlockmeet‚Äô
![Blockmeet Colombo](https://d.img.vision/growstudio/blockmeetmontage.png)

Here is a list of the community building and education our team has provided before and during their time with Grow, we will ramp this up once we have the funding to support growth!
2019 - First ever Global Game Jam in Sri Lanka
2020 - 2nd Game Jam
2021 - 3rd Game Jam (Online)
GJ+ (Game Jam Plus)
2020 - First ever GJ+ In Sri Lanka
2021 - Online
Sri Lanka University Workshops ‚Äì educational content delivered at the following Universities
University of Moratuwa
University of Sri Jayawardenapura
General Sir John Kotelawala Defence University
University of Colombo
Sri Lanka Institute of Information Technology (SLIIT)
Academy of Design (AOD)
National Institute of Business Management (NIBM)
Blockmeet
2023 - Blockmeet - First ever Web 3 event in Sri Lanka
Continue ‚ÄòBlockmeet‚Äô every month.
# PIPELINE #
Game Dev Hackathon Q2 2023
Game Dev Workshops in Schools Q2 2023

Blockchain Development Courses at our Studio in Colombo - Ongoing
Unreal Engine Institute Certified Courses TBC
EDUCATION - WORKSHOPS

column15: Book - Women of DeSci, ReFi, ReSci & DeFi
column16:
Book Proposal   (Sept. 2022 - Updated April 2023)
 
Subject: Women of DeSci, ReFi, ReSci & DeFi - A Reference Guide, Ed. 1 


Purpose:  üíû

As Web3 ecosystems grow, especially in the areas of decentralized science, regenerative finance, regenerative science and decentralized finance,  more women are taking innovative and active leadership roles. As these areas become more mainstream we anticipate more media interest and event opportunities for women who are engaged in DeSci, ReFi, ReSci and DeFi  to share their stories, their projects, and their views on shaping these nascent ecosystems.  We also intend to foster and encourage cross-disciplinary pollination in hopes of creating an ever more robust pluriverse.


Project Thesis: üìóüìö

Book. Compilation of women (and those identifying as such) who are front and center in the Web3 movements of DeSci, ReSci, ReFi and DeFi.

Each profile will be 1 - 2 pages and include the person‚Äôs picture (or avatar) and organization or affiliation logo, short bio, passion project, Web3 origin story, favorite quote. This reference guide is primarily meant to elevate and honor the women forging new paths in these nascent Web3 disciplines and to support their voices as subject matter experts for media, events and speaking engagements. 


üôãüèº‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏èüôåüèº üôãüèª‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏èüôãüèæ‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏èüôãüèº‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏èüôåüôåüèªüôåüèøüôãüèø‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è


Many media organizations, event producers/co-ordinators, speakers bureaus are at a loss when it comes to sourcing thought leaders in DeSci, ReFi, ReSci and DeFi who are female &/or identify as such. *Note: ReSci and DeSci are meant to be inclusive of Open Science.

This Quick Reference Guide is  to serve as a useful and essential tool. It‚Äôs a tool for people and  organizations when they are looking to book speakers, media interviews, panel participants, board members, thought leaders and other expert roles in this nascent and specialized field of blockchain meets science, regenerative finance, engineering, math, technology, art, fintech and open science. 

‚û°‚ñ∂Landing Page is here:
 https://book-women-of-desci.carrd.co/

üíû Intake Form Here: Tally Forms
https://tally.so/r/wo99e1



üèÜSuccess CriteriaüèÜ


     ‚úÖ Published First Edition of Book with from 50 to 100 profiles

      ‚úÖ Robust Landing Page with video vignettes featuring Women of DeSci, ReFi, ReSci and DeFi

      ‚úÖ Booked Speakers/ Panelists/ Experts in all kinds of blockchain, Web3, open science, engineering, finance, fintech events (not just DeSci or ReFi)

üíÅüèæ‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏èüíÅüèΩ‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏èHealthy, supportive ecosystem that can offer bounties & grants to further STEAM Ed learning

Membership Badges & or NFTs, possible token-gated community 




üü® Scope üüßüü¢
We aim to be a reference guide in book form and a directory of video vignettes that serve the interests of the wider Web3, STEAM, Blockchain and Open Science communities



üíå Full Project Description HERE

https://docs.google.com/document/d/1nlySNN2a03W9eyhy5kf0mr3WJQ02I7gNW-sdgsUZ5Ys/edit?usp=sharing

It also supports ecosystem building because, as a reference guide, it gives a framework of the women (and those identifying as such) who are building in the areas of DeSci, ReFi, ReSci and DeFi.
This book further builds community because the above mentioned areas can become silo'd, so this builds bridges between the respective disciplines creating more of a community of shared expertise and resources. 
And this book contributes to education in that the women who are and will be listed in this reference guide are all trailblazers doing substantive and remarkable things in the larger context of Web3 and blockchain.

Editorial experience at the NY Times, Gannett, Huffington Post and more.
Publisher of 4 books already - both fiction and non-fiction.
Proceeds from the book will go towards supporting the women in these communities, their projects and the ecosystem.
I am active in the DeSci, ReFi, ReSci and DAO communities. 
My team member is an accomplished Data Scientist and also a policy analyst.  This is her first gitcoin round so she is joining more as an observer. 

This project originated as Women of DeSci, but after 7 months of evolution and evaluation, I have curated it into its current form, Women of DeSci, ReFi, ReSci & DeFi to be more inclusive and more of a bridge between the fields. 

I (Paige) was named as one of the most influential women of Web3 for 2023. Not to boast, but I believe this will help in the Book Launch once it's published. column16: Burning Sissy Valley is a 1-day QTPOC (Queer, Trans People of Color) pride event. The Event consists of QTPOC focused workshops (one including web3 and finance), networking, performers and ends with a dance party. The objective of the event is to build community, provide resources, and highlight QTPOC community members and artists.

column16:
# Introduction:

Offroad Studios is excited to launch its flagship game Zaliban in the metaverse. The game is not just a game, but a vision for the metaverse. We have put in a lot of hard work and finances into the game development of characters and their stories, and then turning them from concepts to visually appealing 2D and 3D characters. Zaliban is a brainchild of Offroad Studios & Bilal Lashari, the creator of "The Legend Of Maula Jatt," one of the biggest movies ever made in the region. We plan to integrate blockchain technology to secure the ownership of NFTs and enhance the in-game economy.

![Ak47 Level 2](https://i.seadn.io/gae/XQGjihhkQ9HPsODMqP9hn_zwqn1BKgE7lUzWeX4awW8l25Brd8gGQp6MVu2Q9Uc60GMXYqGxsdBi9mb2SG6I8OjE4CRw5kf-ucMivA?auto=format&w=1000)

# Mission:

Our mission is to bridge the gap between the Web 3 & the traditional gaming world. With advancements in Web 3 and its implementation by Unity in the recent past, we plan on integrating web3 and NFTS in our game in such a way that the users not only have a real-time gaming experience but it is easy for them to adapt to the web3. ## One of our primary goals is to attract gamers who are currently reluctant to step in to web 3.

![Drone Level 2](https://i.seadn.io/gae/lwrjapn6zYyok_0TqHp6U58F5isV0AslYXU9-k1OKGx9GJgKSLrcLQUai7iH1pmIT02YZoVruq4P645L2U9Y6zl7mQyKa6fAJwOBNQ?auto=format&w=1000)

# Business Model:

Our business model is based on a revenue-sharing model with NFT holders. A percentage of the game's revenue would be shared with NFT holders in the form of royalties. This model aligns our interests with the interests of NFT holders, providing them with an incentive to support and promote the game. We would soon be integrating a members area to our website where the nft holders would be able to connect there wallet and have erly access to game play, merchandise and other and information on the utilities for the NFT Hoolders. 

All stake holders that fund the project would also be airdropped special nfts giing them ownership of the game in phase 2 once the smart contract is deployed and made public. The level 1 and 2 NFT holders would be the most superieor considering they were the initial source of funding for the game.

![Apache Level 2](https://i.seadn.io/gae/ZaJFVJBD8sbezE_sI6QEMXALtiFip3cIoZiEqnhqXLn8sgYw9_8mUYal46p3ZaF-eW36pY0YdyuwPeyDyHyJ_AM_G63aOfRBBLlyNQ?auto=format&w=1000)

# Product Overview:

Our game, Zaliban, is built on the Unity game engine, and we plan to launch it on multiple platforms, including PC, mobile devices, and consoles. The game is built around the characters, where each character is an original and comes with their unique story and characteristics. We have split the characters into two different clans - the Eastern Clan and the Western Clan. We plan to periodically release NFTs for these characters on the Ethereum blockchain.

In the first phase, we have launched two levels of NFTs for each character. The Level 1 NFT holders would be the highest in rank and would benefit the most out of all the stakeholder / NFT holders considering they joined us at the earliest stages of the launch. Level 3 and level 4 NFTs would be launched a little later, and they would be launched along with an original smart contract created specifically for the game Zaliban, which is currently being worked upon. At the launch of the smart contract, the Level 1 and Level 2 NFT holders would also be airdropped additional NFTs, their value depending upon the NFTs each individual holds. The airdropped NFTS would have their value while maintaining the original value of the NFTS they hold. There are 4 Heroes for both sides and 6 types of War units for both sides. Each character has been thought of and conceptualised from scratch with and has a story associated with it, We would be turing the game in to a movie in the later phases but the stories are hilarious and catchy. We have made sure that bothh east side and west side are properly balanced with each other interms of stats etc.



  # East side Heroes - # West Side Heroes 

- The Shepherd         - Captain West     
- Kali                 - Agent Babe       
- Time Zero            - General          
- Sama                 - Nanomite Scientist 


  # East Side Troops - West Side Troops 

- Ak 47 Soldier        - Marine           
- RPG Soldier          - Jetpack Rider    
- Commando             - Flame Thrower    
- Bomber               - humvee           
- Gundalaa             - Artelliary       
- Rocket Truck         - Apache          





In the second phase, all NFT holders would be distributed tokens in the form of airdrops, which would be extensions to the characters they own. They can further distribute and resell these tokens to other users for them to experience Zaliban in the metaverse. The distribution of these tokens would be based on the level of NFT a person holds, i.e., the higher the level of NFT you have, the more tokens you get to further distribute. And in the same way, the higher level of NFT, the earlier you're allowed to test your characters in every type of game world we create.

![Gundalaa](https://i.seadn.io/gae/AlTLG3NPPjc3biXC4ezbyIczZ7r_0pRsv-kvsn0RGa54nu_5EzES5lYu_MuS2UA1BrQjSor0X7vBaPUurJXgWH6ZGTHDJlzyBO71dw?auto=format&w=1000)

# Target Audience:

Our target audience includes gamers and blockchain enthusiasts who are looking for something different and unique in the gaming industry. With the integration of NFTs and Web3 technology, we plan to attract a new set of users who are interested in owning digital assets and exploring the metaverse.

![Shepherd Level 2](https://i.seadn.io/gae/fsbF9ASbcsJNhg8y6hwfGsVuIvPs0jyRDf9-IjKavi0jAd_affcaRP7cgQ3GMVSqEBSBoTqD3s07-_tQutB208bsFN89cRlKPS0QZQ?auto=format&w=1000)


# Conclusion:
Offroad Studios' Zaliban game is a visionary creation that integrates web3 and NFTs to provide users with a real-time gaming experience while also making it easy for them to adapt to web3. We believe that our revenue-sharing model, combined with our innovative ideas and experienced team, makes Zaliban a game-changer in the metaverse. By focusing on creating content, growing new communities, and providing educational resources, we hope to improve the Web3 ecosystem and qualify for the Web3 Community and Education grants.

![Marine Level 2](https://i.seadn.io/gae/wuevGfTrYnr5V3FBj8e9VUH_Da8TwPOqUslLYSiXt7RXgiAMrdaaTtb4gPI8_CHdXhz_d9jcsPmP-x4V43FiHzDKnWXVweaqTlMfZQ?auto=format&w=1000)


For more information: jd@offroadstudios.com

Usefull Links:

[Our Story](https://blog.offroadstudios.com/from-games-to-digital-agency-to-games-to-nfts-to-games-3a042e7fcd94)
[Opensea](https://opensea.io/collection/zaliban)
[Offroad Studios ](https://www.offroadstudios.com)
[Offroad Studios App Store](https://apps.apple.com/us/developer/off-road-studios/id631326557)
[Offroad Studios Playstore](https://play.google.com/store/apps/dev?id=4645564864318173740)
[Youtube](https://www.youtube.com/offroadstudios)
[Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/offroadstudio)

column16:
Cryptoversidad is an organization dedicated to **educating about Web3**, helping people to **understand, use, contribute and build with Web3 tools**. Our mission is to accelerate the mass adoption of Web3, as we believe thiss will have a positive impact on society. To achieve this, we **create and distribute high-quality content**, to teach and help individuals utilize blockchain tools, and participate in communities and projects. We want to make Web3 more **accessible and understandable for everyone** by simplifying and speeding up the learning process.

We fullfill our mission by doing the following: 

- Educational content: We create and distribute high quality educational content that smoothly and easily explain important concepts in 5-10 minute animations. This is done in the form of courses, YouTube videos and other formats.
- Community and events: Our community consists of crypto/blockchain enthusiasts on YouTube, Twitter and Discord, where we host weekly online events. In addition, we have participated as panelists and collaborated events like ETH Latam and ETH Panama.

### Values

Cryptoversidad‚Äôs values are the essential **characteristics** that we want to **practice**, **incentivize**, and **express** within the team, the community, and any product we create.

1. **Positive impact:** We have a strong focus on ideas, people, actions and projects that add value and improve people's lives.
2. **Collaboration:** Aligning synergies and working together to achieve a common goal allows us to get there much faster and with greater impact.
3. **Community**: Cultivate an space made up of unique and active people who seek to learn and get involved in the ecosystem.
4. **Transparency:** Being open about our interests, intentions and actions is fundamental to maintaining a valuable relationship with everyone involved in the project. 
5. **Responsibility**: Assume the consequences of our actions and take action to do the best possible.

### Project Goals:

Cryptoversidad‚Äôs main goal is to **accelerate the mass adoption of Web3**. We achieve this general goal by doing the following:

1. Help the community **understand the concepts** of the blockchain ecosystem.
2. Guide the community by **teaching how to use web3 dApps** and tools. 
3. Engage with our community to **help them contribute and participate** in the whole ecosystem.


### Previous work:

1. Launch of our course: We are about to launch the most complete Introduction to Web3 course there is the Latam community, we have partnered with more than 10 of the most important communities to provide free access to it (Spanish, view [here](https://cryptoversidad.com/en/)) 
2. Worked with the Ethereum Foundation to research, produce and distribute a 36-video series that teaches the basic concepts of blockchain technology and Ethereum. Reaching over 76,000 views and accumulating more than 3,000 watching hours with these videos. (Spanish, view [here](https://youtube.com/playlist?list=PLWqn8qbq_bAHHCUv23r6-vJyKSHSiB-Cb)) 
3. Worked with Aave to:
- Create audiovisual content explaining the basics of Aave: A 15 video series that explains their whole documentation in easy to understand animated videos. (English, view [here](https://youtube.com/playlist?list=PLWqn8qbq_bAF3d_KyBkSbMqn4mpx5mrS3))
- Explain GHO, their new stablecoin in 5 videos: In a series of five videos, we introduced the new GHO stablecoin to the AAVE community. (English and Spanish, view [here](https://youtube.com/playlist?list=PLWqn8qbq_bAHTEK7C8UaJcZaKubN0_3Ty))
- Translation of technical documentation: Leveraging our bilingual skills, we translated and simplified AAVE protocol‚Äôs complex documentation for new developers entering the ecosystem.

To know more about us, you can visit our website: [https://cryptoversidad.com/en/nosotros/](https://cryptoversidad.com/en/nosotros/) And if you have more questions, feel free to ask us!

### Why is your project important/special?:
Because the process of understanding web3 concepts, learning to use its tools and being able to actively get involved in the ecosystem is difficult, complicated, confusing and time consuming. People are less encouraged to do it because it costs them too much work and time. Cryptoversidad structures, facilitates, simplifies and speeds up this process significantly by giving high quality education content, without the influence of price, FOMO or FUD.

column16:
This Gitcoin grant is generated by the ResearchHub Foundation, which houses the ResearchHub Community and seeks to assist the community in supporting various contributors, hosting scientific educational events/hackathons and community operations.

SciCon 2023:
Our annual event, SciCon, was kickstarted in 2022 with the intention of collating various players in Decentralized Science from traditional academics, to DeSci projects and entrepreneurs/investors. You can find the website for SciCon2022 here to get a sense of the event (https://researchhubcommunity.wixsite.com/scicon2022). SciCon2022 was an educational event to inform traditional academics about Decentralized Science, DAOs, and Web3. We hope to take our learnings from SciCon2022 and have a more wide reaching, polished and successful SciCon2023. 

ResearchHub Foundation and ResearchHub Platform:
ResearchHub's mission is to accelerate the pace of scientific research. The goal of ResearchHub Inc is to make a modern mobile and web application where people can collaborate on scientific research in a more efficient way, similar to what GitHub has done for software engineering. While the core ResearchHub Inc team is busy building a product, the ResearchHub Community focuses on bringing together motivated individuals who are dedicated to the project‚Äôs mission of accelerating the pace of scientific research. We are a group of passionate academics who independently support the development of ResearchHub and DeSci through hosting educational scientific events and seminars, and focusing on development of a robust reputation system for DeSci.

column16:
WHAT IS FACTLAND

Factland is a nonprofit Web3 DAO created by Evan Hansen, Pam Statz, John Plevyak and Keith Axline. Our mission is to slow the spread of misinformation online by making it easy for anyone to flag untrustworthy claims and have them promptly adjudicated by a decentralized community of fact checkers paid in crypto. Our verdicts will be made available via an open API for any platform connected to the Internet to use as contextual labels on their content.

Beyond reviewing facts, Factland offers a new paradigm for achieving consensus, by inviting everyone to participate, encouraging active listening, and adversarial debate. All three have been shown in research to increase trust via inclusion, which traditional fact checking methods have either or actively undermined by creating the perception of bias.

Factland solves the unspoken gripe of the Internet: Why was I not consulted?

Last, the jury decisions delivered by Factland reflect not the opinion of elites, but the provable consensus view of society as a whole.

Using the Factland Dapp, people can upload claims for community review and comment, and stake FACT tokens to vote on whether they are true or false. Cases are decided by anonymous juries drawn randomly from the community to weigh the evidence and issue a verdict. Stakes are split between the winners, jurors and community investigators who contributed the best evidence.

All jury selection data and verdicts are stored on the blockchain where anyone can check for tampering and get a verification.

HOW FACTLAND WORKS

Report Fake News: When you see dubious social media posts, photos, videos, conspiracy theories or other suspected misinformation, submit the link to Factland.org with a clear title and description of the claim to be decided. The community will do the rest.

Choose Sides: Stake FACT tokens on claims to create an incentive pool to pay investigators, jurors and the winning side.

Get Paid to Collect Evidence: Receive FACT tokens for discussing and sharing information about submitted claims. Investigators who provide the most convincing evidence get the biggest share.

Help Decide the Truth: From time to time you will be invited to serve on an anonymous random sample jury to review evidence and issue a verdict. Jurors receive FACT tokens for their service.

OUR MISSION

Factland promises to increase the scope, speed and reliability of fact-checking by using crowdsourcing and "trustless" verification to decentralize the normally costly and time intensive job of weighing evidence.

OUR AUDIENCE

Web sites which display information e.g. Twitter, Google News can use the Factland case history to present fact-checking results.  People interested in checking a fact directly e.g. Snopes can use Factland or Factland derived data.  Individuals interested in staking a Claim can use Factland to do so.  Individuals interested in researching a Claim can post comments and evidence as to the authenticity of a Claim.  Finally individuals interested in participating in juries can help adjudicate claims.

WHAT YOUR FUNDING MAKES POSSIBLE

The funds raised from this grant will go towards the following items that are currently slowing down executing on the vision and product:

- Branding and UI upgrades. The core team does not include a designer so we'll be contracting with one to elevate our branding and UI.

- Non-profit legal work. We'll be hiring a lawyer to get us in compliance with our 501(c)(3) status and approve our roadmap to decentralized governance.

- Marketing and community growth. Getting the word out through marketing campaigns and referral rewards.

- Accelerated development. Contracting with developers, potentially via bounties, to iterate quickly through our roadmap.

- Surplus funds will go into a treasury for future expenses. The treasury will eventually be controlled by the community through DAO governance. Founders will not draw a salary until the product and community have sufficient resources.

TEAM EXPERIENCE

Factland is a nonprofit Web3 DAO created by Evan Hansen, John Plevyak, Keith Axline and Pam Statz. Our team is based in San Francisco and Portland, OR. Thus far we‚Äôve contributed our personal time and resources to develop, design and promote the Factland demo. 

Evan Hansen is a 30 year news veteran, who's served as the top editor at Wired.com, Medium and Periscope and was most recently director of curation at Twitter. He's collected numerous industry awards for journalism excellence and innovation. He is a Founding Board Member, President and CEO of FactlandDAO.
https://www.linkedin.com/in/evan-hansen-1342146/

John Plevyak, PhD is a Director of Engineering at DFINITY with more than 30 years of experience at companies large and small, including Google, Cray, and Inktomi specializing in large systems, Web2 and Web3. He is a Founding Board Member, Vice President and Chief Technology Officer of FactlandDAO.
https://www.linkedin.com/in/john-plevyak-004737/

Pam Statz is a creative technologist with 25+ years experience in UX and UI design, story telling, digital strategy, and product management. She has led large scale digital projects for Lucasfilm, WIRED, Wieden+Kennedy, and NIKE. She is a Founding Board Member, Secretary and Chief of Strategy and Operations at FactlandDAO. 
https://www.linkedin.com/in/pamstatz/

Keith Axline is a full-stack mobile and web developer living in Portland, OR. He had a previous career in media as an editor and photo editor at Wired.com and Medium. He is a Founding Board Member, Treasurer and Chief Product Officer of FactlandDAO.
https://www.linkedin.com/in/keithaxline/


BECOME A FACTLAND BETA TESTER 

- Create an account on https://demo.factland.org/

- You'll get 1000 FACT testing tokens. If you run out of tokens, visit your account profile page and click 'Reset Balance'

- Create claims, add evidence, join juries, and comment

- Submit claims via email to factland.bj8gj@zapiermail.com. Place a title in the subject line, and a description and links in the body. You'll receive an emailed link to review a draft version. Simply edit and submit.

- Questions? Check out the Factland FAQ at https://demo.factland.org/faq

SHARE YOUR FEEDBACK 

Once you've spent some time creating claims, adding evidence and taking part in juries, we have a few questions for you to help us figure out the next iteration of the product.

You're also welcome to share feedback in our Discord at https://discord.gg/eQ58kxSk8w

column16:
The Archimedes' Lever developed from the Neuroscience of Ethereum (https://bounties.gitcoin.co/grants/7514/neuroscience-of-ethereum-decentralized-science-fo) during the inaugural Gitcoin Grants Decentralized Science #DeSci Round. A very big thank you to all supporters of such innovative ideas that cannot grow and impact the world in the realms of Traditional Academia.

This project is about restoring the Spirit of Science and directing it towards the intended purpose of the Scientific Process - Discovery of Truth. Today, Governance over the Scientific Process is misdirected towards proving that which is desired to be established as truth, for the purposes of control and profits by 3rd parties. This can be summarized by Goodhart's Law: 

"When a measure becomes a target, it ceases to be a good measure."

The Scientific Process is driven by the motive to gather evidence against the null hypothesis in order to disprove it, consequently lending credence to the hypothesis in mind. The inverse is ubiquitous. The Scientific Process is heavily influenced by Ego Bias - the self-oriented drive to extract value for oneself at the expense of others; the opposite of Public Good. 

This is fundamentally causally related to the plethora of global problems humanity faces today; therefore, we must facilitate the widespread adoption of Decentralized Science #DeSci

This project aims to Apply Archimedes' Insights by symbolically deploying the Archimedes Lever, so as to onboard the next wave of users to web3. Innovations in Money, Decentralized Finance, Decentralized Governance, Decentralized Autonomous Organizations, Decentralized Identity, and Hybrid Applications will be integrated to create and deliver Value for web3 citizens - for We, the People.

This project is for those who believe the IMPOSSIBLE is POSSIBLE - to those who believe in the Infinite Garden & the Infinite Machine; to everyone who is here to uncover & discover Truth; to us all who live to unlock the untapped potential of Decentralized Science #DeSci - to the ground shakers & the Earth Movers - LFG üåéüî•üöÄ

Stay Hungry; Stay Foolish ü§™üòàüòé

zkpod.ai aims to be a hub for interesting, natural and fun ways to interact with ZK and cryptography related knowledge. We use bleeding edge AI tools to run our experiments.

column16:
# **Actocracy. The Future of Civic Engagement.**

Welcome to **Actocracy**, where disrupting tech and immersive gameplay collide to create a platform that **revolutionizes community-driven initiatives**. Dive into a metaverse where your actions directly **impact the real world**, help shape the future of **democratic decision-making**, and promote better **public goods distribution** through its innovative **Quadruple voting** and **Quadruple funding** game mechanics.

![Actocracy](https://actocracy.com/img/p2.png "Actocracy Background.")

#### Documentation and References:
*  [Actocracy Light Paper.](https://actocracy.com/docs/lightpaper.pdf) ‚Äî **The quintessence of Actocracy**
* [Quadruple funding & Quadruple voting in Actocracy](https://actocracy.com/docs/QFA.pdf) ‚Äî **Article Preprint**.
*  [Actocracy Public Deck.](https://actocracy.com/docs/publicdeck.pdf) ‚Äî Detailed docs (Old version).

#### Key features of Actocracy:
‚ú® **Zero Entry Barrier**: Dive into Actocracy with no upfront costs, and join a diverse, inclusive community of players. There are absolutely no fees or upfront payments required to begin your journey. Moreover, no previous experience in cryptocurrencies and Web3 is needed to play. With zero entry barrier, we guide millions of non-crypto-natives on their way to web3 space.

üåè **NFT Lands & States**: Acquire, govern, and trade unique NFT virtual assets for a truly immersive gaming experience. The real Earth‚Äôs surface is divided into 237 Billion of Land plots with an average area size of 2150 m2. Each Land on the Earth could become a sovereign **Actocratic State** with its own economic, social and political life, **fully-governed by its population** of residents, citizens and regularly elected administration (Government). [![Watch the video](https://actocracy.com/img/23.png)](https://actocracy.com/img/06.mp4)
The right of property over each Land is represented by a single unique upgradable **Land NFT** that could be claimed, transferred, purchased or sold on auction within the internal or external marketplace.

üî• **Exciting Activities**: Embark on captivating adventures, including:
* ‚õ≥Ô∏è **Exploration**: Uncover new territories, expand your State, and connect with fellow players.
* üë• **Community Building**: Rally local Residents, Citizens, and Government to participate in Actocracy's governance and State Treasuries' funds distribution.
* üôè **Cultural Exchange**: Celebrate diversity by sharing and learning about various cultures and beliefs.
* üéÆ **GameFi Quests**: Craft and engage in dynamic quests driven by your favorite Lore.
* ü´µ **SocialFi Campaigns**: Ignite and partake in campaigns that uplift your community through Actocracy's democratic model.

üèõ **Quadruple Voting & Quadruple Funding**: Experience the future of democratic decision-making with our innovative mechanism that ensures equitable resource allocation and representation for all.

üå±Ô∏è **Real-World Impact & Incentives**: Make a difference in the real world through Actocracy's unique **checkin2earn** and **act2impact** game mechanics. **Earn rewards**, influence your virtual environment, and engage in **State Treasuries' asset distribution**, Land-related activities, and truly **democratic decision-making**.

ü´∞ **Tokenomics**: Fuelled by **DACT** (Digital Activity Convertible Token) and **DIMP** (Direct Impact Monetary Piece), Actocracy's token economy allows users to vote, fund initiatives, and reap the benefits of their participation. Significant portion of DIMP generated by users goes towards solving social and environmental problems. All funds used to impact on the most pressing local issues are being **distributed by user communities** themselves ‚Äî Making a difference on a global scale. 

‚ú® **Actocracy** combines web3, gaming, and advanced democratic principles to offer an interactive and rewarding space for users and projects alike. We are working hard to bring Actocracy MVP to the market, therefore we ask for your support to make it happen. **Seize this opportunity to pioneer the future of community-driven initiatives on Gitcoin!** And do not hesitate to spread the word if you like it.

#### **Support Actocracy now and become part of the revolution!**

![Actocracy](https://actocracy.com/img/flag.svg "Actocracy Flag.")

####  Core Team
##### **Co-Founders**: [Alexander Blanc](https://www.linkedin.com/in/alblancc/),  [Sergey Gonchar](https://www.linkedin.com/in/sergeygonchar/), [Anatoly Mikus](https://www.linkedin.com/in/a-mikus/)

##### **CEO**: [Alexander Blanc](https://www.linkedin.com/in/alblancc/)

##### **Head of Research**: [Dr.Dimitry Mihaylov](https://www.linkedin.com/in/dmitry-mikhaylov/)

##### **AI Researcher**: [Vera Chumansky](https://www.linkedin.com/in/vera-chumansky-8013b9105/)

##### **CMO**: [Stanislav Khamidulin](https://www.linkedin.com/in/stanislav-khamidulin)

##### **Advisors**: [Sergey Gonchar](https://www.linkedin.com/in/sergeygonchar/), [Dr.Dimitry Mihaylov](https://www.linkedin.com/in/dmitry-mikhaylov/)

column15: Factland DAO: Bet on Factual Disputes and Convene Random Sample Juries to Issue Verdicts and Rewards
column16:
WHAT IS FACTLAND

Factland is a nonprofit Web3 DAO created by Evan Hansen, Pam Statz, John Plevyak and Keith Axline. Our mission is to slow the spread of misinformation online by making it easy for anyone to flag untrustworthy claims and have them promptly adjudicated by a decentralized community of fact checkers reward in tokens. Our verdicts will be made available via an open API for any platform connected to the Internet to use as contextual labels on their content.

Beyond reviewing facts, Factland offers a new paradigm for achieving consensus, by inviting everyone to participate, encouraging active listening, and adversarial debate. All three have been shown in research to increase trust via inclusion, which traditional fact checking methods have either or actively undermined by creating the perception of bias.

Factland solves the unspoken gripe of the Internet: Why was I not consulted?

Last, the jury decisions delivered by Factland reflect not the opinion of elites, but the provable consensus view of society as a whole.

Using the Factland Dapp, people can upload claims for community review and comment, and stake FACT tokens to vote on whether they are true or false. Cases are decided by anonymous juries drawn randomly from the community to weigh the evidence and issue a verdict. Stakes are split between the winners, jurors and community investigators who contributed the best evidence.

All jury selection data and verdicts are stored on the blockchain where anyone can check for tampering and get a verification.

HOW FACTLAND WORKS

Report Fake News: When you see dubious social media posts, photos, videos, conspiracy theories or other suspected misinformation, submit the link to Factland.org with a clear title and description of the claim to be decided. The community will do the rest.

Choose Sides: Stake FACT tokens on claims to create an incentive pool to pay investigators, jurors and the winning side.

Be Rewarded for Collecting Evidence: Receive FACT tokens for discussing and sharing information about submitted claims. Investigators who provide the most convincing evidence get the biggest share.

Help Decide the Truth: From time to time you will be invited to serve on an anonymous random sample jury to review evidence and issue a verdict. Jurors receive FACT tokens for their service.

OUR MISSION

Factland promises to increase the scope, speed and reliability of fact-checking by using crowdsourcing and "trustless" verification to decentralize the normally costly and time intensive job of weighing evidence.

OUR AUDIENCE

Web sites which display information e.g. Twitter, Google News can use the Factland case history to present fact-checking results. People interested in checking a fact directly e.g. Snopes can use Factland or Factland derived data. Individuals interested in staking a Claim can use Factland to do so. Individuals interested in researching a Claim can post comments and evidence as to the authenticity of a Claim. Finally individuals interested in participating in juries can help adjudicate claims.

WHAT YOUR FUNDING MAKES POSSIBLE

The funds raised from this grant will go towards the following items that are currently slowing down executing on the vision and product:

- Branding and UI upgrades. The core team does not include a designer so we'll be contracting with one to elevate our branding and UI.

- Non-profit legal work. We'll be hiring a lawyer to get us in compliance with our 501(c)(3) status and approve our roadmap to decentralized governance.
 
- Marketing and community growth. Getting the word out through marketing campaigns and referral rewards.

- Accelerated development. Contracting with developers, potentially via bounties, to iterate quickly through our roadmap.

- Surplus funds will go into a treasury for future expenses. The treasury will eventually be controlled by the community through DAO governance. Founders will not draw a salary until the product and community have sufficient resources.

2022-2023 ACHIEVEMENTS

FACTLAND received a $25,000 Developer Grant from the Dfinity Foundation and completed the following deliverables: 

1. IC login (Internet Identity) Integration
- Enable primary login via IC Internet Identity
- Enable associating IC Internet Identity with other login types (e.g. email/password)
- Store user profiles on the IC

2. Store and serve certified fact check and resolution information from the Internet Computer blockchain
- Make the IC the primary data source for outside consumers of Factland claim data
- Provide certified claim data via HTTPS

3. Store and serve certified fact check and resolution information from the Internet Computer blockchain
- Provide certification checkable claim data via an API 
- Provide certified provenance and history for fact check and resolution information

TEAM EXPERIENCE

Factland is a nonprofit Web3 DAO created by Evan Hansen, John Plevyak, Keith Axline and Pam Statz. Our team is based in San Francisco and Portland, OR. Thus far we‚Äôve contributed our personal time and resources to develop, design and promote the Factland demo.

Evan Hansen is a 30 year news veteran, who's served as the top editor at Wired.com, Medium and Periscope and was most recently director of curation at Twitter. He's collected numerous industry awards for journalism excellence and innovation. He is a Founding Board Member, President and CEO of FactlandDAO.
https://www.linkedin.com/in/evan-hansen-1342146/

John Plevyak, PhD is a Director of Engineering at DFINITY with more than 30 years of experience at companies large and small, including Google, Cray, and Inktomi specializing in large systems, Web2 and Web3. He is a Founding Board Member, Vice President and Chief Technology Officer of FactlandDAO.
https://www.linkedin.com/in/john-plevyak-004737/

Pam Statz is a creative technologist with 25+ years experience in UX and UI design, story telling, digital strategy, and product management. She has led large scale digital projects for Lucasfilm, WIRED, Wieden+Kennedy, and NIKE. She is a Founding Board Member, Secretary and Chief of Strategy and Operations at FactlandDAO.
https://www.linkedin.com/in/pamstatz/

Keith Axline is a full-stack mobile and web developer living in Portland, OR. He had a previous career in media as an editor and photo editor at Wired.com and Medium. He is a Founding Board Member, Treasurer and Chief Product Officer of FactlandDAO.
https://www.linkedin.com/in/keithaxline/

BECOME A FACTLAND BETA TESTER

- Create an account on https://demo.factland.org/
- You'll get 1000 FACT testing tokens. If you run out of tokens, visit your account profile page and click 'Reset Balance'
- Create claims, add evidence, join juries, and comment

Questions? Check out the Factland FAQ at https://demo.factland.org/faq

SHARE YOUR FEEDBACK

Once you've spent some time creating claims, adding evidence and taking part in juries, we have a few questions for you to help us figure out the next iteration of the product.

You're also welcome to share feedback in our Discord at https://discord.gg/eQ58kxSk8w

column16:
In November 2022, Machina was launched with the help of the talented artist Dylan, who has previously worked with Nexon, Blizzard, and PUBG, as well as founder 0xpyeongyang.

Machina is a 3,333 PFP NFT project that seeks to inspire and promote the creativity and passion of all creatives in the Web 3.0 space.

We have been adding value by identifying alpha information from other NFT projects and providing whitelist opportunities.

My aim is to create a launchpad that can assist web 2 companies in Korea to transition into the web 3.0 space. With my extensive network, I will provide advice to these companies on how to cater to the needs and preferences of consumers in the Web 3.0 space.

', 'type': 'paragraph', 'hidden': True, 'answer': 'I am writing to propose a project that I believe would be a perfect fit for the Web3 Community & Education Round. As a passionate advocate for the Web3 ecosystem, I am excited about the opportunity to contribute to its growth and development.

My project, Machina, is focused on onboarding new users, providing NFT educational resources, and growing new communities. We have been active in the Web3 space for over 6 months and had already been building for a year before launch. We have a proven track record of success in onboarding new users as well as providing educational resources through Discord. Our long-term goals include growing new communities and onboarding new users from Web 2.0. We have achieved recent milestones such as expanding the team and hiring collab managers to grow the community.

We are committed to improving the Web3 ecosystem by providing safe and alpha information. Our project fits the eligibility requirements for the Web3 Community & Education Round as we provide daily information on NFT trends.

We are dedicated to Web 3.0 and believe that our project can make a meaningful contribution to the Web3 ecosystem. We are excited about the opportunity to participate in this round and believe that our project has the potential to have a significant impact.

Thank you for considering our proposal. We look forward to the opportunity to work with you to support the growth and development of the Web3 ecosystem.

column16:
Since 2020, Today in DeFi has provided educational defi news, analysis, and content on a daily basis.

DeFi plays a fundamental part in web3 yet it has barriers to entry and evolves at a light speed. Today in DeFi provides simplified daily recaps, event analysis, and step-by-step tutorials on hand-picked projects, keeping our readers up-to-date in web3 and lowering the bar to access new chains/projects.

Since its launch, Today in DeFi has grown to 15k+ followers/readers, published hundreds of educational newsletters and threads, keeping users up to date and educated on Ethereum L2s and Zk rollups like such as Optimism, Arbitrum, zkEVM, as well as leading Dapps like Aave, DeFi Saver and more. 

With the Grant, Today in DeFi aims to increase the quality & quantity of our content, as well as covering more Ethereum Technical content such as EIP summaries,  in order to reach more audiences and make web3 more inclusive & accessible.

We have been sharing blockchain technology for the past 5 years and has become one of the most popular websites in the Chinese world, 5K+ users visit our website every day.

The goal of Upchain Community is to help users understand the basic principles of blockchain technology, master blockchain application scenarios and development skills, thus creating an all-round blockchain learning and communication platform for users.
Currently the website has published more than 5k+ articles, solved 4.5k problems, has 200+ hours of video content, and held 50 sessions while we translated a large number of technical documents, such as

column15: Chinwags: Focused Retreats for Web3 Builders
column16:
_Retreat + Hackathon + Think-thank. Collaborative problem-solving with deep relaxation in nature. üå±_
---
![A cross between a think tank, hackathon and retreat in a beautiful natural location](https://uploads-ssl.webflow.com/63bc7b2f6521f9114bdb49af/643ea905fc6dffd3cfb63954_Intro%20image.png "A cross between a think tank, hackathon and retreat in a beautiful natural location.")

---
# **We believe web3 needs more events focused on tangible outcomes.**
---

**Why Chinwags?**

* Large conferences center around fast-paced networking and product shilling, without space for deeper conversation and creation
* Small online events can be challenging for attendees to connect personally and stay focused
* In-person side events and workshops are held alongside city conferences, without time for decompression and deeper problem-solving

üëâ **_Here lies an opportunity to create intentional, outcome-oriented spaces to enable deeper levels of collaboration._**

---

**The Goals**


* Connect minds on the most important challenges in web3
* Create intentional spaces with a sharp focus on outcomes
* Facilitate partner-led workshops with deep ecosystem knowledge
* Unite dedicated builders during the bear market
* Provide natural landscapes for healthy routines, decompression & creative thinking

---

**What we‚Äôre building:**

Nature-based retreats for web3 builders, set in beautiful locations around the world with programs intentionally designed for long-format, deep discussions and plenty of healthy decompression in between. 

Chinwags are designed to foster creative thinking, collaborative solution design, and deeper connection between participants so that together we can address some of the larger challenges in the web3 space.

**üëâ We‚Äôve launched [Chinwag #0](https://www.chinwags.xyz/chinwag-0): a genesis event for the DAO ecosystem.**

This retreat brings in experienced builders as well as emerging founders, focused on addressing some of the larger challenges faced by DAOs: 

* Pending regulation in the EU & USA
* Participation rates in governance
* Public perception of DAOs
* Funding mechanisms
* Community health


üëâ **With your support, our small team can continue building the core framework for this project, enabling anyone to run their own localized retreats for the web3 space.**
 
Let‚Äôs evolve the web3 events space to create the room we urgently need for creative solution design and coordination, to progress through our biggest challenges together.

---
# Every donation counts, and we would greatly appreciate your contribution!
---

‚ûú **[Visit our Website](https://chinwags.xyz/)**
‚ûú **[Join Telegram group](https://t.me/chinwags_xyz)**
‚ûú **[Follow us on Twitter](https://twitter.com/Chinwags_xyz)**

column15: Regens Unite: Building bridges between web3 and local regens
column16:
‚òÖ Recently featured on the [Greenpill Podcast](https://podcasts.apple.com/be/podcast/greenpill/id1609313639?i=1000609431550). A movement of community events and educational media. üåø 

---
![For web3 to have an impact on the world, it must connect with the people working on the ground..](https://uploads-ssl.webflow.com/62ea1fbc3776a4eed826a3ad/643d9b97242abe60e1d7b174_For%20web3%20to%20have%20an%20impact.svg)

Regens Unite is building bridges between all the different types of regenerative sectors by creating intentional spaces for learning, collaboration, and unification to drive forward global solutions together.

We bring together regenerative thinkers and doers in **Climate Activism, Technology, Purpose Organizations, Cooperatives, DAOs, Impact Investing, Regenerative Finance (ReFi), Decentralized Science (DeSci), and Art.**

We do this in 3 ways:

* **IRL events**: we organize our own events to explore how we can create safe and brave spaces where all Regens feel warmly invited and where they can build new relationships outside of their respective bubble. Locals get to learn about web3 and people in web3 get to know about how we can regen our communities, our bodies, our environment (see video below).
* **Educational content**: we create engaging educational content to expand and support the movement. Our "Regens Unite Handbook" facilitates independent, locally organized gatherings. Our recorded workshops and sessions from events are publicly available, and we curate relevant content through a monthly newsletter and a shared events calendar.
* **Support**: we offer our support as a community to help fellow Regens organise new events or make their existing events more regenerative. This includes facilitation training or consulting, program curation, and marketing support.

---

Check our Regens Unite Berlin aftermovie üëá

[![This is a alt text.](https://uploads-ssl.webflow.com/62ea1fbc3776a4eed826a3ad/64370a46b8fba018a9aeaeee_RU-Berlin_thumb-700px.webp "Regens Unite Berlin 2022 After movie")](https://youtu.be/CAI0Zc39rm8)

---

![What we're bringing to web3.](https://uploads-ssl.webflow.com/62ea1fbc3776a4eed826a3ad/643d9b9626f22df84176efba_What%20we%27re%20bringing%20to%20web3.svg)

It‚Äôs no secret that web3 needs more diversity and more expertise to achieve true systems change at a global scale. If we want to build regenerative systems, we need everyone involved in the solution design process. 

We are evolving the web3 space by: 

* **Bringing in expertise** from sectors outside of web3 to broaden the regen movement
* Providing an avenue for innovative web3 projects to conduct research and receive **rapid feedback** outside of their bubble
* Designing events with high-quality interaction, and safe spaces for experimentation to **co-create web3 projects with local regens**
* **Driving inclusivity and diversity in web3** through curated attendance, using application processes & scholarships
* **Creating toolkits and media** to elevate project stories, educate on the regen movement, and inspire new groups to get involved

---

![Since last round, we launched:](https://uploads-ssl.webflow.com/62ea1fbc3776a4eed826a3ad/643d9b96e9eaca6490451271_Since%20the%20last%20round%2C%20we%E2%80%99ve%20launched_.svg)

* A brand **[new website](https://regensunite.earth/)**
* A **[monthly Regen Newsletter](https://paragraph.xyz/@regensunite)**
* An episode of **[Greenpill Podcast](https://podcasts.apple.com/be/podcast/greenpill/id1609313639?i=1000609431550)**
* 5 Twitter Spaces with our community
* An open and collaborative **[Regen Calendar](https://www.regensunite.earth/calendar)**
* **[Next events](https://www.regensunite.earth/#events)** in Belgium, Germany, Austria & the UK
* The **[Regens Unite Handbook](https://www.regensunite.earth/#handbook)**: a practical guide for designing regenerative gatherings

[![Regens Unite Handbook](https://assets.website-files.com/62ea1fbc3776a4eed826a3ad/63dc4c6987a2ea795de65519_RU_handbook-mockup.png "Regens Unite Handbook")](https://www.regensunite.earth/#handbook)

---


![What you'll be helping us build:](https://uploads-ssl.webflow.com/62ea1fbc3776a4eed826a3ad/643d9b96c9bc8851fef8449a_What%20you%27ll%20be%20helping%20us%20build.svg)

Our goal is to raise funds to support our DAO and our growing community while we ramp up towards a sustainable model.

**1. Supporting local events in Q2/Q3**

We have 7 immediate IRL events in the works, [check our calendar](https://www.regensunite.earth/#events)

**2. Creating educational media & toolkits**

Providing a platform for regenerative projects and events to be discovered by the wider community.

**3. Developing new partnerships**

Expanding our impact and reach (increasingly in the global south) through aligned partnerships, DAO-to-DAO collaboration, and toolkits to empower local event organizers. 


---


![This is a alt text.](https://uploads-ssl.webflow.com/62ea1fbc3776a4eed826a3ad/643d9ae8dca0e426fd467fe2_Where%20we%27re%20going.svg)

Regens Unite was born in May 2022 with a seed event in Brussels. Since then we have initiated **5 events** in different locations, grown a **Telegram group of 500+ regens**, and formed **a small, distributed team** of dedicated regens passionate about advancing a regenerative future. 

This is our fourth Gitcoin Grants round. We‚Äôve chosen to move from Climate Solutions to this new category of Community & Education as we felt this best represents our core activities, although the two are closely connected. 

Visit our **[About page](https://www.regensunite.earth/about)** to learn more about our history with Gitcoin and our current trajectory.

---
# **Thank you in advance for your support. Every donation counts to help us further our mission to unite all kinds of regens around the world!**
---


üü¢ **[Visit our Website](https://regensunite.earth/)**
üü¢ **[Join Telegram group](https://t.me/regensunite)**
üü¢ **[Follow us on Twitter](https://twitter.com/regensunite)**

column16:
# Upgrading Ethereum

> A technical handbook on Ethereum's move to proof of stake and beyond

I am writing the go-to reference on Ethereum's consensus layer. It is available [online](https://eth2book.info/latest) and (more recently) in prototype [PDF form](https://eth2book.info/bellatrix/book.pdf).

Upgrading Ethereum aims to thoroughly document and explain the current design, the history, and the decision making around our proof of stake protocol. Anyone who has spent time looking into the workings of Ethereum's consensus layer knows that so much information is scattered and hard to find, out of date, or incomplete. I am working on fixing that.

The guts of the book is the [annotated specification](https://eth2book.info/bellatrix/annotated-spec/). This is mostly done (except for some updates for Capella in progress), and covers the entire state transition and fork choice.

Some more didactic sections are done, such as the chapter on the [incentive mechanisms](https://eth2book.info/bellatrix/part2/incentives/) and the chapter on [funky algorithms](https://eth2book.info/bellatrix/part2/building_blocks/).

Much remains to be done, however. In particular, the more introductory material. I want to offer useful material for all levels of experience, keeping it current, accurate, insightful and useful. The book's contents page indicates the scope of what I expect to cover.

This project grew out of my original [Phase0 annotated apecification](https://benjaminion.xyz/eth2-annotated-spec/phase0/beacon-chain/) - hopefully I have demonstrated a decent track record of maintaining things since then. I am very grateful to past GitCoin contributors for all your support and encouragement üôè.

The source material is all available as and when I release work in progress - find it [on GitHub](https://github.com/benjaminion/upgrading-ethereum-book) - and the licence is liberal.

column16:
##RemittDAO
[RemittDAO Discord](https://discord.com/invite/hDXxq6YvdQ "RemittDAO Discord") |[RemittDAO Twitter](https://twitter.com/RemittDAO "RemittDAO Twitter")

### What is RemittDAO?}

RemittDAO is focused on onboarding migrant workers and asylum seekers into digital remittance solutions that don't require a bank.


#### Why do we need RemittDAO?
+170 million migrant workers worldwide regularly send remittance payments to their families in developing countries as a lifeline for survival. This makes up the majority of international payments. The majority have been ignored or dismissed by banks, so they are forces to use archaic brick & mortar remittance providers that charge higher fees and have longer wait times.

![](https://remittdao.io/wp-content/uploads/2023/03/324416004_1370411990434914_7333520307312164404_n-1536x1152.jpg)

#### What does RemittDAO do?
RemittDAO hosts remittance experience workshops for our beneficiaries to practice using the remittance tool that best meets their needs. 

![](https://media.discordapp.net/attachments/1022482125112492082/1070359932819488858/IMG_5800.jpg?width=1348&height=1120)

#### How did RemittDAO get started?
RemittDAO got its start in Hong Kong, where migrant workers from developing countries are highly concentrated. We spent 7+ years building relations with migrant communities. RemittDAO documented a video tutorial of a migrants remittance journey using a tool that allowed cash sent to be spent directly at retail locations without need for an off-ramp. 

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC_H1sV8cbdqjJ_coF-kI3Xg

#### Why donate to RemittDAO?
The grant money will be used to provide a trial run of 10 independent remittance workshops in Hong Kong. The workshop flow will be video documented and results used to restructure & improve for future workshop seires.

![](https://remittdao.io/wp-content/uploads/2022/08/imgpsh_fullsize_anim-1.jpg)

column16:
DAO Times is a platform dedicated to supporting DAOs by providing a space for sharing education, experiences and achievements. DAO Times promotes decentralization, fairness, and innovation for a better future, while also treating its audience with great respect. The platform refrains from using banner ads, sponsored articles, or any other form of advertising, focusing instead on delivering high-quality, educational content for its community.

The initiative has made a positive impact on the DAO ecosystem, receiving praise from DAO builders and enthusiasts. They appreciate the platform's educational focus, which informs and teaches people about DAOs, as well as the respect shown to the audience by avoiding intrusive advertising. Testimonials highlight the high-quality content, thorough coverage, and commitment to pushing the Web3 industry forward, making DAO Times a valuable resource for the community.

In 6 months of reporting, DAO Times has published over 230 articles and garnered almost half a million impressions in Twitter.

column15: 0xEdu - The first decentralized K-12 curriculum and school
column16:
0xEdu is the first opensource K-12 curriculum, teaching methodology and decentralized school template in the world. Its curriculum will be maintained by educators collaborating virtually and asynchronously, and its teaching methodology is based on nurturing soft skills and entrepreneurial thinking.

0xEdu will create a single on-site lab school in Los Angeles, California to serve as the engine behind curriculum creation, and the proof-of-concept behind the overarching philosophy of 0xEdu.

The 0xEdu team is comprised of stellar teachers, administrators, degens, quantitative psychologists and social and emotional learning experts. The team believes that education is long overdue for a rebirth. 

Students matriculating from 0xEdu will be fluent in multiple programming languages as a condition of graduation. They will know how to design, deploy and maintain a crypto project via a testnet. They will be equipped to tackle any project they wish to, and will get the expert guidance needed to bring their concept to market. 

We're creating the human of the future. 


--The story so far--

In 2022, we began exploring how to open a school that is both in-person but allows for its curriculum to spread out to every corner of the globe. Our solution was to treat the school curriculum and methodology like a decentralized network of educators making it their own.

In September of 2022, we began exploring existing schools that may want to take part in this project. We found a school that did not yet have an Innovation Space (a place where students learn by project-based learning, one of the hallmarks of 0xEdu), which agreed to let us build and create a space in their building.

This process has been taking place for the past several months, and the lab was furnished and started operating in March. The current goal is to grow the lab and to introduce people to the idea of this teaching methodology existing on its own, as a free standing school, while we raise funds. Once the funds are raised, we can replicate our success from this lab in an in-person setting, hopefully bringing with us some momentum and excitement from this small pilot program.

We anticipate needing at least $200,000 to start the freestanding school, and to ensure its existence for the first several months. From there, we hope that tuition fees and further fundraising can keep the school growing and functional. At the moment, all of our funds have come from donors who believe in the program and the need for the reinvention of education. As web3 is upon us, the world is ever more changing rapidly, so we hope by focusing much of the school's tech department around blockchain literacy, how to use AI and how to understand new tech as it emerges, we are engendering learning that equips our students for the world of today and tomorrow.

The project currently revolves around a single school location and around teaching entrepreneurial thinking via project based learning, but with funding the project hopes to open a dedicated on-site location as a stand-alone school, teaching both regular subjects and also with a heavy emphasis on emergent technology readiness training."}, {'questionId': 9, 'question': "If you've participated in past grant rounds, please share any new updates or milestones from the prior months", 'type': 'paragraph', 'hidden': False}, {'questionId': 10, 'question': "Anything else you'd like to share about your project, previous work, or other project affiliations? The ultimate goal has always been to open a school and challenge current notions about education. Doing so with the centerpiece of web3 readiness training allows us to show the world both the legitimacy of blockchain tech, but also how a true 21st century human needs to be equipped to tackle the world as it is today and will be moving forward. At the moment we are a very small team, which is a necessity to keep the budget low and also to keep the core focus on the topics we believe to be most important for the curriculum, but we hope to grow dramatically within our first five years, and we also hope to engage a community of educators so that we can truly decentralize our curriculum and open-source it for anyone to use.'}, {'questionId': 11, 'question': 'Does 50% of your team reflect the diversity of the community your project serves with a particular emphasis on including women, Black, Indigenous, and People of Color (BIPoC), individuals with disabilities, and members of the LGBTQ+ community?', 'type': 'multiple-choice', 'hidden': True, 'encryptedAnswer': {'ciphertext': 'act0qLjch+a4fd9RCfT5ZigDJnySL8MpC3K2cn/wsJA=', 'encryptedSymmetricKey': ''}}]

column16:
ENG:
H.E.R. DAO LATAM is a talent incubator dedicated to empowering self-identifying women, trans women, and non-binary individuals in Latin America by providing education, resources, and opportunities in the Web3 ecosystem. Our mission is to diversify the blockchain ecosystem by breaking language barriers, nurturing talent, and offering financial freedom through learning and creating opportunities.

In 2022 we made a significant impact, with over 15 IRL workshops across 5 countries (Brazil, Mexico, Colombia, Peru, and Panama), 10 webinars, 55 sponsored individuals to attend hackathons and conferences, and 20 successful hackathon projects. 

In 2023 we aim to reach 3 new countries (Guatemala, Honduras, and Bolivia), with a strong focus on University outreach, and develop a team to serve as a delegate for governance participation in OP for womxn in LATAM.

Through this grant, we aim to expand our reach, impact, and support for underrepresented individuals in the Web3 space, ultimately driving diversity, innovation, and revenue generation.

ESP: 
H.E.R. DAO LATAM es una incubadora de talento dedicada a empoderar a personas que se identifican como mujeres, mujeres trans y personas no binarias en Am√©rica Latina, proporcionando educaci√≥n, recursos y oportunidades en el ecosistema Web3. 

Nuestra misi√≥n es diversificar el ecosistema de blockchain rompiendo barreras ling√º√≠sticas, fomentando el talento y ofreciendo libertad financiera a trav√©s de oportunidades de aprendizaje y desarrollo.

En 2022 hemos logrado un impacto significativo, con m√°s de 15 talleres presenciales en 5 pa√≠ses (Brasil, M√©xico, Colombia, Per√∫ y Panam√°), 10 seminarios web, 55 personas patrocinadas para asistir a hackatones y conferencias, y 20 proyectos exitosos de hackatones. 

En 2023, nuestro objetivo es llegar a 3 nuevos pa√≠ses (Guatemala, Honduras y Bolivia), con un fuerte enfoque en la divulgaci√≥n universitaria y en desarrollar un equipo para participar como delegadas en governanza en OP enfocada en mujeres en Am√©rica Latina. 

A trav√©s de esta grant, buscamos expandir nuestro alcance, impacto y apoyo a personas subrepresentadas en el espacio Web3, impulsando la diversidad y la innovaci√≥n.

Liker Land is the next generation of Web3 bookstore. Connecting writers and their audience through Writing  NFTs, empowering writers to monetize their content and build a loyal community.

Writers can publish blogs, novels or books from any  platforms as NFTs. Readers able to support the authors and own the content they like.

We believe that NFT native content will drive the future of publishing. Writers and readers can own their authorship, readership, and social graph. Interact under a more open royalties structure, co-create new content, and uphold a more endurable and scaleable creator economy.

Join us on a journey through the future of publishing, where imagination knows no bounds and creativity is king.

column16:
The Mechanism Institute is a resource for designing cryptoeconomic solutions to a wide range of coordination problems. Our aim is to advance the practice of cryptoeconomics by shortening iteration cycles.

We are currently compiling a comprehensive library of coordination mechanisms, complete with implementation examples and educational resources. This will make it easy for anyone to tap into the learnings from different successes and failures in the space. 

The library will also serve as a rich source of information for an AI we are developing. The AI will be to answer mechanism design-related questions and aid in the design of complex systems. In the future, the AI will be capable of developing key components for a system, such as user interfaces, smart contracts, documentation, and simulations. This should dramatically streamline the process of materializing new ideas to solve complex multi-agent problems.

Please consider contributing to the library and supporting the project!
