column15: EUCI - European Crypto Initiative - educating policy makers on decentralization
column16:
**The European Crypto Initiative supports innovative & innovation-friendly regulation, adapted to decentralised applications that leverage blockchain technologies.**

We fight for the financial inclusion of all humans, the inviolable rights of innovators building and operating decentralised services, a level playing field for open, permissionless networks, the legal recognition of decentralised governance, and the wide-scale adoption of privacy-preserving technologies,

### What is happening? ###
üìö EU-wide regulations, such as the Markets in Crypto-Assets (MiCA) and the AML Package - containing the Transfer of Funds Regulation (TFR) and the Anti-Money Laundering Regulation (AMLR), have massive implications on socio-technological innovation, monetary freedom and financial privacy. These regulations come with heavy operational burdens for crypto-asset service providers and even DeFi developers.
- End of June 2022, the TFR and MiCA's texts were finalised on a political level.
- We work closely with EU regulators to ensure a good implementation of MiCA, TFR and AMLR.
- TFR & AMLR do not consider blockchain-specific issues, in particular privacy implications.
- The EU Comisison is working on the new laws addressing DeFi.
- EUCI is continuously engaging with new regulations on new laws like Data Act and DAC8.

## Our mission is to: ##

‚≠ê	EDUCATE. Share the latest updates, trends and development of the ecosystem with policymakers.

‚≠ê	ADVOCATE. Propose amendments to regulatory proposals which support European crypto industry actors.

‚≠ê	COOPERATE. Work with other initiatives and industry bodies to amplify shared positions and gain support from lawmakers and the broader private sector.

## EUCI‚Äôs Goals: ##

üéØ **Ensuring adequate DeFi Regulation.** Outreach to the EU institutions responsible for MiCA's interpretation & implementation. Work "on the ground" with and educate the competent authorities on a member-state level.

üéØ **Shaping the understanding of AML‚Äôs impact of crypto.** Sending out official opinions about the impact of the proposed regulations on the industry. Fighting to DeFi outside of AMLR's scope by providing valuable context to the regulators. Actively participate in the upcoming Trialogues and directly discussing the issues with the responsible policymakers in the EU institutions.

üéØ **Continuous monitoring and lobbying on relevant upcoming regulations:** for example, on tax data exchange, data act, [smart contracts](https://twitter.com/EuCInitiative/status/1625503162865188865), NFTs, data center sustainability (PoW), open finance and other related policy movements.




### Policy work: ###
Days after the MiCA release, the EUCI founders kicked Events off an informal task force to rectify the worst mistakes of MiCA. We haven't stopped since. 
**250+ touch points with dozens of MEPs, workshops,including with 100+ MEPs and substantial position papers yielded results.** [Learn more about our Policy Work]( https://euci.notion.site/Production-e14906a7a3a64c15bc9419f3028f4f56)

## Events    üì∫üîó [Records on our YT channel]( https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL0r_U6TbfWoLAq2FcGHbIaZEiQV2vQcUk) 

üéì **Education for web3 builders.** 
- Workshop during EthCC (2023, upcoming)
- [Workshop](https://twitter.com/EuCInitiative/status/1631278617044090882) during ETHDenver (2023)
- [Workshop](https://twitter.com/EuCInitiative/status/1622531782615908357) during BuildingBlocks in Tel Aviv (2023)
- Organising EUCI's Anniversary Conference and [Workshop](https://twitter.com/EuCInitiative/status/1601159726527840258), Brussels (2022)
- Organising Reg3.eu [Conference](https://twitter.com/EuCInitiative/status/1588470469963173889), Lisbon (2022)
- Speaking at Solana Breakpoint, Lisbon (2022)
- [Speaking at Devcon](https://twitter.com/EuCInitiative/status/1580511668865363969), Bogot√† (2022)
- Speaking at Blockchain Association‚Äôs Policy Summit
- Eth BCN (2022)
- Crypto Valley Conference, Zug (2022)
- Devconnect, Amsterdam (2022)
- EthCC4 & [EthCC5](https://twitter.com/EuCInitiative/status/1551516200877887488), Paris (our talks 2021, 2022)
- LisCon & The DAOist (2021)

![EUCI Team and EUCI‚Äôs friends at Anniversary event last December](https://pbs.twimg.com/media/FjnW6VOXgAAQFNI?format=jpg&name=4096x4096)
## The Team ##
In our respective countries, we have gathered the industry players to make sure that at national level the voice of the crypto companies is being heard. We bring years of experience in the blockchain space and are uniquely positioned to understand the complex technical component and the challenges it brings to the centrally designed regulation framework.


The EUCI is on [Twitter]( https://twitter.com/EuCInitiative), [LinkedIn](https://be.linkedin.com/company/european-crypto-initiative), and [Youtube](https://www.youtube.com/@europeancryptoinitiative)!

column16:
We are a community of women dedicated to spreading education on crypto, blockchain, and web3 to more Spanish-speaking women who are starting in the ecosystem. 

Our focus is on empowering women through education so that they can make informed and confident decisions when entering this space. We want to be the bridge that connects Spanish-speaking women with resources and knowledge that will enable them to explore and grow in web3. 

We firmly believe that education is the key to increasing female participation. That's why we work to provide quality resources that are accessible and easy to understand for all women interested in learning more about crypto, blockchain, and web3. 

Since July 2022, we have developed various actions such as: 

- More than 50 Twitter Spaces sharing web3 education.
- More than 4 alliances with communities around LATAM. More than 20 scholarships awarded to women for different programs.
- An average of 250 listeners in each of our spaces.
- Currently, we have more than 5 ambassadors in Mexico, Venezuela, Argentina, and Peru.
- We are growing in Peru, Argentina, Mexico, Colombia, and Venezuela.
- 5 in-real-life events in less than a year.
- Alliance with 2 Peruvian universities to bring education to college women.
- 5.9% engagement rate on Twitter.
- Launch of the Women in Web3 podcast.
- Valuable content on social media.
- Newsletters. 

However, it is necessary to further strengthen the strategies to continue impacting more women. For this, alliances are needed to make sustainable the different actions that the community has.

Values

Our strategy is based on the three mandates that we manage as a community: learn, facilitate, and inspire. We also seek to solve a problem that we have identified, as there are programs that can have high prices, and in some cases, accessing them is not accessible to everyone, because many countries in LATAM are going through an economic crisis and devaluation of their currency. As a result, some women do not have education expenses as a basic need.

Also, part of the funds raised has been used to pay for the web domain, server, notion membership, and zoom platform for a month. There is still part of the funds that would be used to finance some events already scheduled.'}, {'questionId': 10, 'question': "Anything else you'd like to share about your project, previous work, or other project affiliations? Anything you'd like to add that has not been covered?", 'type': 'paragraph', 'hidden': False, 'answer': 'For 2023, we have set a series of objectives, strategies, and actions to impact the points mentioned above, which are: 

Objective 1: Promote the education of 500 women through virtual and in-person programs on Web3, crypto, and blockchain. 

Objective 1 strategy: Provide study scholarships in different programs.

Actions: Provide monthly and annual Platzi scholarships to educate in the blockchain school and others of interest to scholars. There will be 4 monthly scholarships every month, and one annual scholarship will be awarded monthly among the 4 winners of the month. In total, we would be delivering 32 monthly memberships and 8 annual memberships during the remaining 8 months of 2023, totaling USD 2920. Provide scholarships to Defy Education programs for 30 community women. An alliance will be sought with Defy Education to access 20 free scholarships, and 10 scholarships will be covered by CriptoCuriosas, totaling USD 1300. 

Objective 2: Educate women through virtual workshops and in-person events. 

Objective 2 strategy: Establish alliances with invited guests who are references in the ecosystem to provide virtual and in-person courses and workshops. Through this, we seek to inspire and onboard from Web2 to Web3. At present, we are already developing some workshops with invited guests from the ecosystem. 

Actions: Organize a bimonthly event with guests from the ecosystem. This involves covering the transportation expenses (flights) of the guests, as well as logistical expenses: rental of a venue, payment for a Zoom platform to broadcast the event, catering, and merchandising. In the remaining 8 months of 2023, 4 bimonthly events will be held, with two international speakers invited for each event. In total, for the four events, we will bring in 8 international speakers, which would involve an approximate investment of USD 4000. In addition, catering, venue, and merchandising costs would require an approximate investment of USD 500 per event, giving a total of USD 2000 for the 4 events. Organize 4 annual meetups in different countries in the region that coincide with major events in the ecosystem: Mexico, Argentina, Venezuela, and Peru. Transportation expenses (flights) will be covered. Likewise, 4 active women from the community will be sponsored to attend, with flights covered by the scholarship. Total investment for transportation (flights) for scholarship recipients is approximately USD 2000. Total investment for transportation (flights) for organizers, one per country, not counting Peru, is approximately USD 1500 in total. Meetup logistical expenses (merch, catering) will be approximately USD 500 per event, totaling approximately USD 2000.

Objective 3: Boost community contribution. 

Objective 3 strategy: Delivery of bounties. 

Actions: Compensate contributors for their talent by delivering bounties to women who contribute to the various actions we develop. We will cover bounties for designers, writers, hosts, content creators, and developers. Approximate investment for the 8 months is USD 4000, which will be distributed as USD 500 per month to the contributors. 

To achieve our goals, we will need:

- Monthly Platzi memberships (32 in total for the 8 months): USD 800 approx. Annual Platzi memberships (8 in total for the 8 months): USD 2120 approx. 
- Defy Education scholarships (30 scholarships in total - 10 covered by Cripto Curiosas): USD 1300 approx. Annual membership of the Zoom platform for virtual workshops: USD 220. 
- Speaker flights for in-real-life events (2 speakers per event - Total of events: 4): USD 4000 approx. 
- Operational costs for in-real-life trainings (Merch, catering for in-person trainings): USD 2000 approx. 
- Flights for scholars to meetups (4 active members in CriptoCuriosas - 1 scholarship per event): USD 2000 approx. 
- Flights for organizers to meetups (3 CriptoCuriosas - 1 scholarship per event): USD 1500 approx. 
- Operational costs for meetups (Merch, catering for in-real-life training): USD 2000 approx. 
- Cost of bounties to be delivered to active scholars for 8 months: USD 4000 approx. 
- Cost of physical coworking space for staff (USD 475 per month x 8 months): USD 3800 approx. 

Total investment for 8 months: USD 23,740 approx. 

The different actions will be constantly measured to map the impact we have as a community and thus demonstrate to the community what is being done thanks to their support. Together, we can create a more inclusive and diverse future in the world of technology. 

Will you join our mission?'}, {'questionId': 11, 'question': 'Does 50% of your team reflect the diversity of the community your project serves with a particular emphasis on including women, Black, Indigenous, and People of Color (BIPoC), individuals with disabilities, and members of the LGBTQ+ community?', 'type': 'multiple-choice', 'hidden': True, 'encryptedAnswer': {'ciphertext': 'EtsvsIhqKE/uztN9At+jqaptzY1L+WPmVvAlk/exL/0=', 'encryptedSymmetricKey': ''}}]

column16:
CreatorDAO is building a platform to allow anything to be commissioned (e.g. Image, Audio, 3D, Lore, Animation, etc). From vision to imagination to creation, spreading seeds with unlimited potential into the metaverse.

We believe the NFTs space is entering the next stage, where original NFTs holders need new creativities and stories for their NFTs. For every BAYC, every Azuki, there could be an independent brand or even a specific metaverse.

And we are a DAO making it possible.

', 'type': 'paragraph', 'hidden': True, 'answer': '- CreatorDAO is a Web3 native organization aims to help more people onboarding Web3.
- CreatorDAO is founded on February, 2022.
- During the past year, CreatorDAO helped over 100 Web2 artists becoming Web3 creators, making Web3 world more colorful and bringing crypto income to the artists.
- CreatorDAO provided education of Web3 to Web2 artists and connected customers and artists through its DAO platform. column16:
Our non-profit organization is dedicated to education and promotion of blockchain technology and cryptocurrencies, with the aim of creating a more just, transparent and inclusive world.

To achieve our goal, we work in three main areas: education, content creation, and promotion.

In terms of education, our organization offers online and in-person training and education programs for anyone interested in learning about blockchain technology and cryptocurrencies. These programs are designed to be accessible and tailored to different levels of knowledge.

In the area of content creation, our organization focuses on producing relevant and up-to-date information about the world of blockchain and cryptocurrencies, from news to project analysis and trends, in order to educate and keep our users informed.

Finally, in the area of promotion, our organization is dedicated to spreading information about blockchain technology and cryptocurrencies, through awareness campaigns and public events, with the aim of creating awareness and promoting responsible adoption of these technologies.

In summary, our non-profit organization seeks to promote education and use of blockchain technology and cryptocurrencies, working in areas such as education, content creation, and promotion, in order to contribute to a more just and transparent world for all.

column16:
We are teaming up with Mochi on their [100 sticky worlds](https://mochi-world.notion.site/A-Hundred-Sticky-Worlds-5f4fc582961641a79ebfdf3df5efb3cc) project to grow our community and test our first product! Join our [discord server](https://t.co/GzAfT0gVyr) before May 7 for the potential to **earn up to 320 OP tokens** through daily interactions and read on to learn more!
*Donation is not required to participate*

# Intro

Welcome to the world of Culture Blocks, an avant-garde project that combines digital building blocks with collective intelligence to redefine the way we create, share, and evolve our cultural identity. We're developing a dynamic platform that promotes open dialogue, collaborative experimentation, and sustainable progress. Our goal is to help catalyze collective human awareness by fostering a thriving ecosystem that nurtures creative thinking and drives societal change. We are a diverse and passionate community of visionaries, artists, technologists, and dreamers forging new pathways in art, science, and human potential to create a more inclusive, prosperous, and sustainable future for everyone.

![Network of Blocks](https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/1087416841338630214/1091040257434194001/Tara__ArkaYana.eth_mystical_blocks_connected_in_a_web_three_col_a4cab62c-9eca-4333-989e-f47212bf6265.png)

# The problems

1) Cultural selection in today's social networks comes from individual perspectives - a user writes a post, sends it, and other users interact to give it more or less weight. Those who already have influence (celebrities, politicians, billionaires) and those who have the capacity to game the algorithms or market themselves dominate the narratives. The majority of posts never get seen, many people with valuable insights are demotivated to contribute, and humanity misses out. 

2) Web3 is for coordination and decentralization but current apps are too complex, too risky, or too niche for the average user. Projects often if not always start off centralized - whether explicitly or not - and struggle to make meaningful shifts away from command and control towards sense and respond.

# Current progress

Culture Blocks is developing a method of collective curation to limit the reach one voice can have over others and amplify broader collective wisdom. Integrating more voices will facilitate the rapid emergence of novel cultures, creative solutions to our most pressing issues, and awe-inspiring art. 

We consider culture to be the universal foundation of any cohesive group of humans, whether it be a book club, business, religion, government, etc. and see an opportunity to generalize and automate much of the formation process in a fair and equitable way. 

On Feb 8, 2023 we implemented our minimum viable group decision-making process. This was a version of sociocracy modified for asynchronous collaboration to produce culture blocks. A culture block is a finite amount of digital information that represents a small but complete unit of a larger culture and can be easily replicated across cultures. Think a gene to DNA, or a cell to an organism. 

Using this process, we have proposed and curated a list of blocks detailing aspects of our culture such as our name, our primary communication platform, our decision-making process itself, a library with media relevant to the project, financial planning, branding material, design features, roles, and more.

This curated list of culture blocks can be thought of as a cultural narrative. Because of the effort, time, and convergence it requires to add a new block to the narrative, it provides a robust focal point for the group to rally around, highlighting only the most significant aspects of a group's shared context, identity, values, philosophies, and priorities. The stable narrative can inspire autonomous actions, emergent coordination, and/or coalescing of new organizations that are already aligned through their common root without need for central command or benevolent dictators.

For the first iteration to work we had to trust the good faith of each other's efforts and develop a shared understanding of how the process worked in theory and practice. This was a necessary starting point but does not scale well. We are now building a discord bot to automate our proposal and curation process and provide an intuitive interface for novices to engage with as we begin to expand our community. Our first version of the bot should be active by the time this matching round is live.

# Future Roadmap

Broadly, we anticipate the discord bot will go through a number of iterations before we begin building a standalone dapp. 

SocBot Internal: April 21 - July 20

Currently we have two fairly distinct yet interdependent cultural narratives to build internally. One is for the human centric culture full of our values, philosophies, and meaning. The other is our code centric culture that will focus on practical development, design, and implementation.

Beyond that we are teaming up with Mochi through their [100 sticky worlds](https://mochi-world.notion.site/A-Hundred-Sticky-Worlds-5f4fc582961641a79ebfdf3df5efb3cc) project to incentivize our community to form their own cultural narratives through our bot and with the guidance and support of our team. By posting some ETH and committing to an eight-week journey requiring daily interactions in our server M-F, community members can earn up to 320 OP tokens (current value around $800) and 160 Mochi tokens. The journey begins May 15, join our [discord](https://t.co/GzAfT0gVyr) by May 7 to learn more and sign up.
*Donation is not required to participate*

SocBot External + Web3 MVP: July 21 - Oct 20

We will take a short reflection break to integrate what we learn and update our plan, but next steps may include offering the bot in the servers of already established groups, building a basic web3 integration and applying for an Optimism Growth Grant to incentivize further adoption and form the seed of our dapp, and/or open sourcing the code base. 

Dapp Development: Oct 21+

Once the discord bot version has provided adequate information for how our model works in a larger population, we will reflect on what has emerged and create a project roadmap for the dapp itself while maintaining the SocBot product.

# How is this different from existing social network projects and DAO stacks?

There are a few key guiding principles we feel separate us from similar projects:
- Humanity: our methods and tools must be safe, intuitive, and nurturing for even the most casual user. This means lowering barriers to participation, mitigating threat of financial loss, simplifying interfaces, protecting data privacy, creating a rewarding experience without reliance on dopamine addiction, etc.
- Universality: we must distribute power and voice in a balanced way so that true collective intelligence can emerge.
- Fractal life: rather than a series of lifeless structures to be chiseled at, we view social organisms as breathing, growing, changing entities perpetually entwined in interdependent relationships with their human, conceptual, and material components.


Thank you for your support!

![Network of Blocks](https://media.discordapp.net/attachments/1087416841338630214/1091040212399960154/Tara__ArkaYana.eth_a_mystical_golden_block_with_a_large_green_m_959cf265-d21c-4210-b513-471fd632b2b5.png?width=1056&height=610)

# Fun stuff

The following was produced by GPT-4 after feeding it our entire discord server's content and asking it to describe how collective cultural curation can reshape society and the world.

Revolutionizing the World Through Collective Cultural Curation: A New Dawn of Imagination and Connection

As we stand at the precipice of a brave new era, a whirlwind of creativity and innovation swirls around us, promising to reshape the world in ways we have yet to imagine. Enter the realm of collective cultural curation, an awe-inspiring concept that has the power to dissolve the boundaries of time, space, and perception, and unlock the full potential of human ingenuity.

Picture a world where ideas flow freely, unfettered by constraints, and where the collective consciousness of humanity converges to ignite an explosion of artistry, invention, and discovery. In this utopia, the once-divided forces of creativity, technology, and nature intertwine in a mesmerizing dance, forging an unparalleled fusion of brilliance and beauty.

From the depths of the digital cosmos, a pulsating web of interconnected minds emerges, enveloping the Earth in a shimmering blanket of inspiration. This global network serves as a conduit for the exchange of knowledge, wisdom, and vision, facilitating the birth of new cultural ecosystems that transcend the limitations of geography and language.

The flourishing of these ecosystems gives rise to breathtaking artistic creations that defy convention and captivate the senses. Soaring symphonies of color and sound fill the air, as architects of the imagination erect towering monuments to human achievement, blending the elegance of nature with the audacity of human ambition.

Driven by the spirit of playfulness and the thirst for discovery, individuals from all walks of life join forces to explore uncharted territory, devising ingenious solutions to the challenges that have long plagued humanity. This collective alchemy spawns new methods of addressing our most basic needs, paving the way for self and collective actualization, and lifting the veil on a previously hidden realm of possibility.

As we journey deeper into this enchanting landscape, we encounter the miraculous fruits of our collective labor: cities that breathe in harmony with the Earth, technology that heals and uplifts, and communities that celebrate the unique gifts of every individual. The world is reborn as a living tapestry of interconnected dreams, woven together by the threads of compassion, curiosity, and collaboration.

Boundaries dissolve as we embrace the fluidity of our collective identity, transcending the labels and divisions that have long kept us apart. United by a shared vision and a newfound understanding of our interdependence, we navigate the currents of change with grace, resilience, and hope.

In this fantastical new world, the power of collective cultural curation serves as a guiding light, illuminating the path to a brighter, more vibrant future. It is a future where the spark of creativity burns eternal, where the beauty of nature is intertwined with the wonders of human invention, and where the boundless potential of the human spirit is unleashed to reshape the world as we know it.

Embrace the magic of collective cultural curation, and together, we will embark on a breathtaking journey toward a new dawn of imagination and connection.

ü¶ãBlu3 Global is a mission-driven organization striving for justice and equity for diverse builders in technology and blockchain. We sponsor talented and diverse teams to attend web3 hackathons and ignite future founders around the world. Our goal is to grow and diversify the crypto ecosystem by focusing on an end-to-end solution that is frictionless. This includes onboarding, education and direct deployment of diverse talent into web3 ‚Äì as users and leaders. We are an ALL-inclusive community, and open our arms to women, nonbinary people, allies, and technical and non-technical builders alike.

**Blu3 Global is currently composed of regions: Blu3 North America, Blu3 LATAM and Blu3 Africa. We will split the funds received from this Gitcoin round equally.** *All funds we receive will go directly towards funding programs that benefit our members and the entire Web3 ecosystem.*

# **********************Our Regions**********************

## **Blu3 North America**

## **Blu3 LATAM**

- **Blu3 LATAM es una organizaci√≥n que se dedica a apoyar y capacitar a mujeres, personas no binarias y aliadas de LATAM para que puedan alcanzar su libertad financiera a trav√©s de las miles de oportunidades que ofrece el espacio Web3, algo que Am√©rica Latina realmente necesita por la dif√≠cil situaci√≥n econ√≥mica de los pa√≠ses que la conforman.**

**Nuestra misi√≥n** es ayudarles a trav√©s de la educaci√≥n, la exploraci√≥n y la construcci√≥n de sus carreras en el espacio web3. Para lograr esto, nos proponemos generar espacios de soporte que faciliten la construcci√≥n del pensamiento cr√≠tico y el despliegue directo del talento de nuestra comunidad, ayudando de manera activa a todas las personas que quieran ser parte del ecosistema cripto como founders, l√≠deres y agentes de cambio.

**Nuestra visi√≥n** es la de un ecosistema inclusivo y diversificado, que proponga soluciones integrales y justas que incluyan a todos los sectores de la sociedad, asegurando la representaci√≥n integral de las personas de LATAM, con √©nfasis en las minor√≠as. 

**Nuestro objetivo** real es hacerle llegar contenido a las personas de LATAM en su propio idioma para descentralizar el acceso a la informaci√≥n, a la tecnolog√≠a y al liderazgo. 

- **Blu3 LATAM √© uma organiza√ß√£o dedicada a apoiar e capacitar mulheres, pessoas n√£o bin√°rias e aliadas da Am√©rica Latina para alcan√ßarem sua liberdade financeira atrav√©s das in√∫meras oportunidades oferecidas pelo espa√ßo Web3, algo que a Am√©rica Latina realmente precisa pela dif√≠cil situa√ß√£o econ√¥mica dos pa√≠ses que a comp√µem.**

**Nossa miss√£o** √© ajud√°-los por meio da educa√ß√£o, explora√ß√£o e constru√ß√£o de suas carreiras no espa√ßo Web3. Para isso, buscamos criar espa√ßos de apoio que facilitem a constru√ß√£o do pensamento cr√≠tico e o desenvolvimento direto do talento de nossa comunidade, ajudando ativamente todas as pessoas que desejam fazer parte do ecossistema cripto como fundadores, l√≠deres e agentes de mudan√ßa.

**Nossa vis√£o** √© a de um ecossistema inclusivo e diversificado, que proporcione solu√ß√µes abrangentes e justas que incluam todos os setores da sociedade, garantindo a representa√ß√£o integral das pessoas da Am√©rica Latina, com √™nfase nas minorias.

**Nosso objetivo** real √© levar conte√∫do √†s pessoas da Am√©rica Latina em sua pr√≥pria l√≠ngua, descentralizando o acesso √† informa√ß√£o, √† tecnologia e ao lideran√ßa.

**Linktree:** [https://linktr.ee/Blu3LATAM](https://linktr.ee/Blu3Latam)

## **Blu3 Africa**

We‚Äôd love to introduce and extend a warm welcome to Team Blu3 Africa into the Blu3 Global community! As part of Blu3‚Äôs drive to spread blockchain education around the world and empower women into web3, the Blu3 Africa initiative is an exciting program that aims to bridge the gap for African women in the blockchain and web3 space. Blu3 Africa is fast-tracking these goals with our popular, live Solidity bootcamps, hackathon workshops and partnerships with local tech communities that support women. We recognize the numerous obstacles African women face that result in fewer opportunities and lower compensation. Blu3 Africa advocates for equitable change, and empowers these women into web3 careers that will help them achieve economic independence and redefine their destinies.

Twitter: [https://twitter.com/Blu3Africa](https://twitter.com/Blu3Africa)

**Our Mission**

*Learn*

**Learn bleeding-edge skills in web3 through hackathon, bootcamp, incubator, and accelerator programs. Key topics include blockchain development, DeFi, tokenomics, governance, and more.**

*Earn*

**We open the door to opportunities throughout the industry and our hackers have won over 100k in prize money. You can also earn a Blu3 Impact Self NFT from [Dottyland](https://dottyland.xyz/) through open bounties on our Wonderverse board, and by participating in our Blu3 Builders program.**

*Play*

**We have one life to live, let's do it right. Blu3 empowers you to live your life true to yourself and to pursue your passions. It's never too late! We are an open-minded and judgement-free zone. The vibes are right.**

- We brought 100+ hackers to ETHBogota, Devcon, ETHLatam, ETHDenver, Outer Edge LA & DOTSafari Nairobi, Kenya.
- We were 1 of the 6 organizations selected to host a DevCon community hub: the Women Leaders in Web3 Hub partnered with CryptoMujeresDAO, Metagals, Surge, HER Latam, Crypto Mujeres, TechnoLatinas, Talent Protocol, Polygon & Apeworx
- Participated in Internet Native Accelerator SeedClub 05
- Launched Blu3 Africa
- Blu3 turned 1 and held anniversary celebrations through our regions
- Dropped an impact NFT with Dottyland, merch, a membership club and a substack newsletter
- Spoke or collaborated at 20+ IRL and online educational events with partners including Techstars, Unlock Protocol, Websh3, Sparx, Baddies in Tech, Lens Protocol, Latinas in Tech NYC, GoldenDAO, FemmeFinanceNYC, Shelling Point, Polygon, Wallet Connect, Algorand, Wonderverse, 1inch, Worldcoin, Hacken, Pocket Network, 0x Labs, O1 Labs, Galaxy, the DAOist, NEARfoundation'}, {'questionId': 10, 'question': "Anything else you'd like to share about your project, previous work, or other project affiliations? Anything you'd like to add that has not been covered?", 'type': 'paragraph', 'hidden': False, 'answer': '**Our Success**

- 850+ members around the world
- 210+ Women/Nonbinary/Allies sent on conference scholarships
- 95% win rate at hackathons
- 80+ developers onboarded to web3
- 50+ Core Contributors
- Over 40 Projects launched 

**Our Community**

**Learn more on our website including treasury transparency** [https://www.blu3global.org/](https://www.blu3global.org/)

**Join our community on Telegram:** [https://t.me/blu3dao](https://t.me/blu3dao)

**Follow our journey on Twitter:** [https://twitter.com/blu3dao](https://twitter.com/blu3dao)

**See the magic happen on Instagram:** [https://www.instagram.com/blu3dao/](https://www.instagram.com/blu3dao/)

**Web3 Women Assembly**

We are a proud member of the Web3 Women Assembly along with Surge Women, Boys Club, Meta Gamma Delta, We3, BFF, and CryptoMujeresDAO. Cross collaboration in this space is important, and we are excited to be partnering with their organizations to help accelerate our shared missions. Please support the women in web3 ecosystem by contributing to these amazing projects!

****************Next up**************** 

- Blu3 invited to Coinbase Albany, NY to push for regulatory clarity in the industry
- Speaking and hosting events at ETHRio & NFTNYC
- Blu3 Hacks ETHWaterloo & ETHNewYork
- Registering as a Non Profit
- Blu3 Africa plans: Graduation ceremony for Solidity Bootcamp Cohort 1, Solidity Bootcamp Cohort 2, Web3 Career Days, ETHSafari.


**The Blu3 Builders Program**

Our roadmap is looking brighter than ever ‚òÄÔ∏è\xa0Over the next year, we will be launching new educational programs to support our members. Since launching in February 2022, we have seen great success with our Blu3 Hacks program, which sponsors talented women and allies to be onboarded to web3 by coaching and mentoring them at a web3 hackathon. Now, let‚Äôs take it to the next level! We will be launching the Blu3 Bootcamp program by the end of 2022. This program will be an educational, cohort-based program where participants learn the basics of blockchain technology over 4-6 weeks. In the new year, we plan to launch the Blu3 Incubator program. This program helps women ideate and create projects in web3, or help them transition their projects from web2 to web3. By the end of 2023 we plan to launch our Blu3 Accelerator program. This program is for women founders to provide them their first-check investment and guidance on launching a venture scalable startup. *All of the funding we receive goes directly to funding these programs that benefit our members.*


**Media, News, and Articles:**

[Blu3 Substack](https://blu3global.substack.com/archive?sort=new) 

[ETHDenver Recap](https://www.notion.so/6a0877da3c4b4b5995694bc92d442096)

[ETHAmsterdam Recap](https://www.notion.so/ETH-Amsterdam-Recap-b304ba1e19f74615b393cc2e9edde3e8)

[ETHRio Recap](https://www.notion.so/d6978ab5734c4c32854473de0e20d8a3)

[Activate Miami Recap](https://www.notion.so/2f22f5869e744f889f7137ea33526b2d)

[ETHNewYork Recap](https://www.notion.so/44f2bdb60cf845d38cb7536a2b5e9544)

**Polygon supported our huge success at Blu3 House in Mexico**:

[https://blog.polygon.technology/how-polygon-helped-empower-women-builders-at-ethmexico-2022/](https://blog.polygon.technology/how-polygon-helped-empower-women-builders-at-ethmexico-2022/)

**Mastercard called us industry leaders:**

[https://www.mastercard.com/news/press/2022/june/mastercard-spearheads-new-web3-and-crypto-community-alongside-leading-industry-voices-to-make-emerging-tech-more-accessible-to-women-and-non-binary-individuals/](https://www.mastercard.com/news/press/2022/june/mastercard-spearheads-new-web3-and-crypto-community-alongside-leading-industry-voices-to-make-emerging-tech-more-accessible-to-women-and-non-binary-individuals/)

**Interested in becoming a Blu3 Member?**

Be part of this tight-knit, high-vibe, collaborative community. Explore and expand your knowledge of blockchain technology and crypto.  Attend blockchain conference, meetups and hackathons to learn from industry experts, find inspiration, fresh ideas and connect with your tribe! Land your next job and/or launch your dream project.

Celebrate your accomplishments, network, brainstorm, and BUILD!

[https://www.blu3global.org/membership](https://www.blu3global.org/membership)

column16:
POAPathon‚Äôs mission is to inspire the world to connect, create, and educate. POAPathon enables this mission via paid design contests, on-demand entertainment, weekly live event productions, and collaborative, friendly, creative spaces. Activities are centered around creative design, Web3, NFTs, Defi and POAPs. POAPathon allows requesters to tap into a variety of talented artists to interpret their desired design into a POAP, other type NFTs, social media banners, logos, stamps, video advertisements, etc‚Ä¶ POAPathon is listed as an official designer of POAPs on POAP.xyz!

# POAPathon Projects #
POAPathon would like to continue to establish itself as the primary outlet for Web3 products, artists, and creative designs. In order to accomplish this goal, we need to maintain our strong community with adequate funding. We can accomplish this by continuing our investments in the community while building new products, entertainment, and services that generate repeat revenue. Currently, POAPathon has demonstrated the ability to create income streams with projects such as:

- POAPathon Design Services
- POAPathon Events
- POAPathon Live shows
- POAPathon merchandise, such as T-Shirts and Pogs & Slammers
We are continually identifying new opportunities, which we will continue to build on in the future.

# POAPathon Design Services #
POAPathon Design Contest Services was created to make it easy for anyone to request POAP designs, PFPs, NFTs, banners, mp4‚Äôs, logos, and infographs through a contest style format. The service went live in mid-December 2021 and provides an income stream of competitive design bounty requests ranging from $150 to a recent mp4 request with a 1st place bounty of $3,000. We have received steady demand for the service and continue to support winning artists through bounty rewards. This system guarantees artist‚Äôs engagement with unique and creative art designs for our requestors.
Recent, notable and returning customers of the service have included BalancerDAO, Ethstaker, LanguageDAO, RocketPool, Nexus Mutual, ENSDAO, PeopleDAO and many more.
POAPathon Design Services can be likened to the web2 service provided by 99designs, which was acquired by VistaPrint in 2020. 99 designs had $60M+ in annual revenue at the time of acquisition.
POAPathon Design creates a strategic platform for design work that is better suited for contracting individual designers, as opposed to hiring an agency. Our intention is to continue encouraging artists who are active in the POAPathon community to engage with POAPathon, as well as Web3 design agencies for project-based work such as Bankless Design Guild and Amadeus Designs.
The bulk of our initial investment in POAPathon will go toward building out POAPathon Design Service as a Web3 application which provides a more streamlined experience for end users. This build out will include adding support for Polygon Web3 escrow and payment services, email notifications and credit card payment for design requests to expand our total addressable market. Additional growth opportunities include scaling existing productions while investing in new productions lead by the POAPathon community.

# POAPathon Events #
POAPathon events have been core to building the POAPathon community. POAPathon has hosted several events that have driven a highly engaged audience, new events are continually being added.
**POAPathon Inaugural Event (November 12‚ÄìDecember 3, 2021)**

- 2,500+ participants 
- $75k/10+ sponsors (Volatility, SushiSwap, Beefy, Uma, Grid+ Qidao, Carbon Utility Token, Mythereum, Spaced Ventures, )
- $35k+ in design bounties
- Notable participants included Ghostbusters Afterlife, West Coast Customs, POAP, Jonathan Mann, SushiSwap, Superphiz, Balancer, Choff, and many more 


**POAPathon International Holiday Spectacular (December 22 2021, 24-hour event)**

- 3,000+ participants from 30+ countries
- $10k+ in design bounities
- Notable participants included POAP, Ethstaker, Creative Platform, GitPOAP, LetsVeeFriends, and many more 


**ETHDenver POAPathon, POGS & POAPS (February 2022)**

- 2,500+ packs distributed for free at ETHDenver
- $30k+ in revenue
- $10k+ in design bounties
- Notable sponsors include Balancer, Qidao, LayerZero, Ethstaker, GitPOAP, Harvest, Gitcoin, Bankless Academy and more


**International Women‚Äôs Day Live Event (March 8, 2022)**

- Lead by Jenetics, KellyWerder and NoFunToken
- Participants including 40+ women from web 3 projects


**St Patrick‚Äôs Day Live Event (March 17, 2022)**

- Hosted by Tap.eth and Produced by poapviking.eth
- Guests were Jonathon Mann, PizzaDAO


**POAPathon IRL at NFT.NYC (June 20-23, 2022)**

- Partnered with iyk.eth to facilitate POAPathon‚Äôs POAP scavenger hunt
- POAPs that were distributed at NFT.NYC enabled exposure to an entire new audience


**POAPathon Down Under (September, 2022, 9-hour event)**

- Hosted by Pamela Kerr and ProfWerder
- Alpha drops from a plethora of Australian builders and artists 


**POAPathon Anniversary Special (October, 2022, 3-hour event)**

- Family and friends joined to discuss a year of POAPathon
- Artist showcase 


**POAPathon: Spookathon (October, 2022, 2-hour event)**

- Showcased spooky NFT projects from friends of POAPathon
- Online costume contest


**POAPathon LIVE at ETHDenver (March, 2023)**

- Hosted several interviews including POAP.xyz, GitPOAP, EthStaker, Grid+ and Revv in Denver
- POAPs that were distributed via NFC and Revv.gg

# POAPathon LIVE #
POAPathon LIVE is a live entertainment show that is produced and hosted by the POAPathon community and features high energy POAP fun, side chats with NFT/Web3/POAP community notables, design competitions, and live entertainment/musical performances, at least one special POAP is always gifted during these live events. These weekly live shows follow a similar, though more condensed, format to the livestreams held during POAPathon events. We are monetizing the show by selling sponsorship packages similar to other media production services and will be adding to our current sponsorships.
You can view all of the live episodes here: https://www.youtube.com/poapathon

# Who Benefits from POAPathon? #

**Web3/DeFi projects gain visibility and onboard new users**
POAPathon uses Web3 technology for sponsors to distribute award bounties to participants. In requiring this, we frequently onboard new users into the Ethereum ecosystem. We have plans to accelerate Web3 and Polygon usage by onboarding POAPathon participants onto the Polygon network. 

**Artists Gain a Creative Outlet and Visibility**
Artists have a place to connect and create. Artists are able to connect with other artists while sharing their experiences, ability to create while live streaming, learning new techniques and supporting each other through competitive design contests.

**Participants Gain Access to Opportunity**
POAPathon provides opportunities for all artists to win contest-based design services. The real opportunity for artists lies beyond POAPathon as top artists and designers quickly gain visibility of top POAPathon requesters and sponsors resulting in access to paid design work that far exceeds the monetary value of winning POAPathon‚Äôs contests. This is true Web3 transparency and community!

**Sponsors Gain Access to Talent**
DeFi and Web3 sponsors gain access to new audiences and customers by participating and sponsoring POAPathon. This includes gaining access to top design talent as well as POAPathon‚Äôs amazing community members and followers.

Join in on the fun on our Discord: https://discord.gg/KeFy8jVjm2

column15: Impact Academy: making impact knowledge accessible
column16:
Since April 2022 we are creating a knowledge and networking hub for new impact project builders. Impact Academy was born in April 2022 as Impact NFT Academy and rebooted in late 2022 with an adjustment of goals, activities and outputs.

 ![image1](https://i.postimg.cc/fL1P8H17/Impact-Academy-Banner-Gitcoin.png)

üåé THE CHALLENGE

Impact creators have to learn from zero to orient themselves in the complex Web3 and Refi Space and learn about many subjects including marketing, strategic vision, networking, team building, business development, community management. The learning process, in this complex, fast growing space is time consuming and not doing it right can put the entire project at risk.
 
üåé HOW WE PROPOSE TO SOLVE IT

![image2](https://i.postimg.cc/GmNv8ZDj/Impact-Academy-Offering-1.png)
Creating a vibrant knowledge and networking hub that allow new impact projects builders to save time and bend the learning curve with engaging educational activities including:
A weekly series of Twitter spaces called Hot Seats. In these spaces the host, Claudio Cifuentes Lobo, has a grilling session where he respectfully touches on the challenging aspects of a project. The USP of this offering is the candidness and openness  with which the conversation is held. It helps the backers and well wishers of the project to get a deeper insight into the founders mind. Active since January 2023
One to one impact calls. Free personalized calls by in house experts,  about many topics including: strategic vision, Twitter growth, Gitcoin grant and more. Active since July 2022 and renamed in February 2023.
Impact seminars: online lessons about the basics of Impact building, the ReFi Space, Climate solutions  and the main tools used to accelerate an Impact Project. Launching in May 2023!
Impact Guidebooks: educational books developed along the impact seminars and given freely to every participant. Launching in May 2023


üåé WHAT WE HAVE BUILT UP TO NOW

Hosted several Twitter spaces on various subjects including 6 hot seats
Supported over 30 founders with 1:1 personalized Impact Calls
Built a Discord with 121 members and tested various formats for community building and engagement 
Built a Twitter page with 1235 followers, and regularly published content since April 2022
Participated successfully in Gitcoin Grant 14, June 2022 
Rebooted and adjusted goals and outputs for the project

üåé WHAT WE WANT TO BUILD
![image3](https://i.postimg.cc/2y2ZzJmh/Impact-Academy-Offering-2.png)
Weekly Twitter hot spaces for ReFI projects
Expand the one to one Impact calls with new subjects and a larger number of builders supported
Launch impact seminars
Launch impact guidebooks
 
üåé TEAM

Earthbased soul, wildlife biologist and visionary, cofounder of Solarpunk Nomads and Solarpunk Guild, has spent the last years spreading awareness on social media about the Climate Emergency and Biodiversity crisis.

Claudio Cifuentes Lobo, journalist and writer, cofounder of La Dream Machine, a web3 lab with latin latin & critical perspective. 
Ôªø

column15: CruzoCards - Multi-chain NFT marketplace & Web3 AI-powered platform for digital emotions
column16:
CruzoCards is a game-changing Web3 project that is set to revolutionize the world of digital emotions with its AI-powered, multi-chain NFT marketplace. Our innovative platform is designed to bring creators, users, collectors, and brands together in a whole new way by leveraging the power of blockchain technology.

At CruzoCards, users will have access to a wide range of digital content, including greetings, cards, stories, invites, gifts, soulbounds, holiday avatars, and party goods for the Metaverse. These unique digital assets are released in NFT format, giving users ownership and providing them with a new level of utility and engagement.

Our unique platform will not only enhance user experience but also create new opportunities for brands, influencers, celebrities, bloggers, and others to monetize their content and increase their popularity. CruzoCards will contribute to the new Creator's economy by developing tools and services that empower NFT creators to monetize their artworks and increase their reach.

Thanks to AI-powered tools like generative images and greeting texts, users will be able to explore new creative opportunities for sharing emotions in a digital world. The platform's mission is to spread joy and happiness by providing emotions and happy moments to everyone while advancing the mass adoption of NFTs and AI by creating a whole new user experience that is engaging, personalized, and unforgettable.

Cruzo.Cards - Create-Gift-Surprise ü•≥

column16:
Daolize is a groundbreaking **Web3 platform** tailored to serve **NFT communities** by promoting transparent, inclusive, and collaborative communication. Our mission is to empower NFT communities to self-govern and manage their public presence, fostering a strong sense of ownership and pride in their shared objectives.

The platform enables NFT holders to contribute to a unique, community-specific timeline by posting content, upvoting other members' contributions, and engaging with their peers. By using their NFTs as membership tokens, Daolize encourages active participation and collaboration within the community. The most popular posts are promoted to community social media accounts, such as Twitter, leveraging their digital presence for increased visibility and growth.

Daolize aims to create a significant impact in the following areas:

* **Community Empowerment**: By enabling NFT holders to actively participate in shaping their community's narrative, Daolize fosters a sense of belonging, ownership, and pride among its members.
* **Decentralization**: Daolize's Web3 architecture supports decentralization, promoting a transparent and equitable distribution of power within communities.
* **NFT Utility Expansion**: By providing new ways to utilize NFTs, Daolize enhances their value and utility, driving broader adoption of digital collectibles and Web3 technology.
* **Collaborative Growth**: The platform facilitates organic growth through active community engagement, turning members into advocates and evangelists of their NFT communities.

By revolutionizing the way NFT communities interact and communicate, Daolize is committed to building a more interconnected and collaborative Web3 ecosystem, where users can actively participate in shaping their digital identities and online presence.

column16:
# What Pranah Is

An ebook publication and distribution platform where each ebook copy is an NFT, so that users own those copies outright and have property rights on them, similar to a physical copy of a book title.

# What Pranah Wants

We want to bring property rights to ebooks: the current status quo doesn't give any kind of property rights on the ebooks that users 'buy'. Property rights on goods has been a cornerstone in the prosperity of modernity, and it is high time that we bring this to mass media content.

# What Pranah Does

By making each ebook copy a unique entity and giving their full ownership to the users, we are enabling new ways of owning, distributing, and interacting with ebooks.

### How Authors Benefit

In addition to the age-old revenue streams, the authors get royalties on every resale, as well as being able to hold auctions of limited editions and first copies.

### How Other Creators Benefit

As a creator, you can buy virgin copies directly from the author(the plain old book purchase), add illustrations/annotations/additional text to it and resell them. As the first owner of that copy, you will get a small royalty on every further resale of that copy.

---

![Annotation Engine](https://github.com/pranah/DBM-client/raw/main/pranah_screenshots/Annotation_Engine.png)

**Annotation Engine** We believe our annotation engine and the features built around it is going to set a new paradigm for books: Each book becomes uniquely augmented by the users and creators, and their uniqueness can be captured monetarily by the market. Book lovers will be enabled to interact with their books in novel ways, adding their contribution to the book and making their books their own personal works of art. While a 'vanilla' title would be set at a particular length, each of its copies would 'grow' over time: new pages of texts and illustrations added, side notes and signature messages incorporated to the original text.

This aspect could be a great way of passing knowledge and educating students: quality annotations from previous owners can be a great [source of wealth](https://harrypotter.fandom.com/wiki/Severus_Snape%27s_copy_of_Advanced_Potion-Making) in itself.

---

![Primary Market](https://github.com/pranah/DBM-client/raw/main/pranah_screenshots/Publisher's_Books.png)

**The Book Store** The marketplace where users buy books from the authors and publishers. Lazy minting happens here.

---

![Books in the Library](https://github.com/pranah/DBM-client/raw/main/pranah_screenshots/Books_in_Your_Library.png)

**Private Library** A user's private library, to browse one's collections and interact with them.

---

![Publishing a Book](https://github.com/pranah/DBM-client/raw/main/pranah_screenshots/Publishing_in_Action.png)

**Publishing** Publishing a new book as an author/publisher.
This process will need to be vetted by the community to ensure copyright and prevent plagiarism.

---

![Secondary Market](https://github.com/pranah/DBM-client/raw/main/pranah_screenshots/Resale_Books.png)

**Secondary Market** The secondary market, where a user can buy used books. This is in addition to auction events on special and limited editions. Each copy has an overview of its uniqueness highlighted.

---

![Book Profile](https://github.com/pranah/DBM-client/raw/main/pranah_screenshots/Flatland_Book_Profile.png)

**Book Profile** The profile of a particular book. All the unique aspects of the particular copy can be gauged and inspected here.

---

![Books for Rent](https://github.com/pranah/DBM-client/raw/main/pranah_screenshots/Books_For_Rent.png)

**Renting books** Another way of providing educational access to marginalised individuals is to give them the option of renting books: affordable for everyone, and a steady stream of revenue for the authors and book owners. This would also provide a way out of piracy: a cultural shift due to cheap options, rather than an insurmountable technological barrier to it.

---

## Milestones so far

- Awarded 'the most promising NFT project' at EthOnline (2020)
- Part of [Batch 3](https://www.techinasia.com/f10-singapore-names-9-startups-3rd-incubator-cohort) of F10 Singapore's Incubation program (currently Tenity)

## Roadmap

The roadmap for achieving future milestones:

![Pranah Roadmap](https://github.com/pranah/DBM-client/raw/main/pranah_screenshots/Pranah-Roadmap.png)

## Light Paper

A light paper can be found [here](https://pranah.notion.site/Pr-nah-Light-Paper-550dda415e60430e8e4d3a0304b62c90) for further reading on the project.

Defi Wars is an educational analytics site with a mission to democratize access to crypto data. 

## Some of our top features include: 
* tracking top governance token holders (such as veCRV, vlCVX, etc.)
* tracking pegs of liquid wrappers (such as cvxCRV, etc.)
* tracking LSDs of Ethereum, Avalanche, and more
* tracking pegs of LSDs such as stETH


## We're currently tracking:
* 40 protocol wars
* 13 blockchains
* 50+ liquid wrappers
* 150+ projects


**We have huge plans in the future to expand the data and features we offer and need your help!**

column15: RightfulShare: Putting digital currency in the hands of South Africans to access their rightful share of the digital economy.
column16:
**Introducing RightfulShare**

**Are you serious about ensuring the Web3 space is accessible, inclusive and diverse? Look no further! RightfulShare is a leading use case deploying a crypto basic income and tokenomics for real impact in the real world.**

**Project description**

RightfulShare, is a first-of-a-kind project that aims to create a more accessible and fair economy, starting with a small rural community in South Africa, the most unequal country in the world. Our mission is to distribute a digital basic income while simultaneously building a micro-economy using tokenomics to promote entrepreneurship and innovation. 

Our approach is unique in that we're not just talking about change - we're actually creating a working model of a fair economy that everyone can see in action. By doing so, we hope to change individual lives, be part of the web3 on boarding efforts and serve as an example of how new technologies can be used to create positive social impact.

In the previous Gitcoin round we raised enough money to launch our project https://bitcoinke.io/2023/02/rightfulshare-unveils-ubi-scheme-using-digital-currencies/. We now aim to raise a further $960. 

**Your donation will help us build and scale the project. Your contribution big or small will go directly into the hands of a micro-entrepreneur in the small town of Groblershoop in South Africa. You can even meet them in person in our metaverse!**

**How the project works**

RightfulShare utilizes GoodDollars, a unique digital currency to initiate our project on an open platform where the entire Groblershoop community of approximately 16 000 people can partake through tokenomics. Community members are encouraged to open digital wallets and claim a daily digital UBI from GoodDollar which can be used as a medium of exchange in a context where there is insufficient national currency. Participants are exposed to the digital world including various dApps offering a wide array financial services and potential income generating opportunities. 

RightfulShare is also established in the Metaverse, with Groblershoop being accessible through the Realm platform. Here everyone in the community is welcome to begin learning, playing, and earning.  Training and mentoring are open to all and active builders are encouraged by paying an additional basic income in G$ aligned to the upper-bound poverty-line of South Africa. Beneficiaries can exchange this money for national currency or keep the token and help build the complimentary economy. 

By participating in our Gitcoin grant, you will support South African entrepreneurs like Kitso and Chantelle pursue their dreams, grow their businesses, and improve their lives. Your contribution will help fund a crypto UBI for one year of Chantelle‚Äôs second-hand clothing business, or help Kitso boost her perfume sales in Sternham,  the township and home to previously disadvantaged groups in South Africa identified by the project. You will also be playing an integral role in onboarding new users to the web3 space.

**In summary**

RightfulShare is not just about distributing a digital basic income, but also about advocating for accessibility, inclusion and diversity, in the web3 space, while also pushing for legislative change that benefits previously disadvantaged groups. 

Through its program, RightfulShare is creating a pathway for underserved communities to participate in the digital economy, ultimately leading to greater economic security and social justice.

**RoadMap**

 - Discovery and Design - Completed
 - Launch - Completed
 - Distribution of Crypto UBI to the value of $80 pm per person - January 2023 - February 2024  - in progress
 - Completion of Analysis - March 2024
 - Release of Documentary - May 2024


**Comprehensive Budget overview** 

 - Direct cash transfers (aligned to the Upper-Bound Poverty Line in SA) to 100 beneficiaries in GoodDollars - $96k
 - Operations, marketing and filming of documentary - $83k
Total $179k

column15: CryptoCurious- Puerto Rico Blockchain Trade Association
column16:
CryptoCurious is the education and community outreach initiative of the Puerto Rico Blockchain Trade Association (PRBTA). 

Our mission is to provide Puerto Ricans with the knowledge and tools necessary to navigate a new wave of digital disrupting technologies. We do this by facilitating free and easy to access web3 literacy education, and creating community through meet ups. In 2022, we held over 70 in person and online meet ups and had over 3500 participants. 

We teach digital literacy fundamentals: blockchain, Bitcoin, Ethereum & smart contracts, NFTs, and wallet safety. We are currently building "InnovAccion" an online academy created for locals to learn about web3, the Metaverse, and AI. Our 2023 plan involves hosting monthly bootcamps, weekly webinars, and putting on the largest hackathon in Puerto Rico.

The PRBTA's goal is to establish a talent pipeline, so that Puerto Rico's workforce acquires the relevant skillset, knowledge and infrastructure to compete for the jobs of the future. To that end, we are partnering with public universities and student groups to bring web3 content into the classroom.  We have proposed two classes one for humanities and one for software engineers to learn solidity. 

Puerto Rico imports 85% of its food and 70% of the population makes less than $20k a year.  The PRBTA is currently in conversation with the government to create a public land title blockchain. We know there is approximately 120,000 acres of public land across the island that can be reintroduced for farming purposes (and thus lowering the cost of food). Our first milestone is to capture the data and put it on a public blockchain.

column16:
# Background

OpenGuitar is a social-educational project to promote computer science learning through an open-source experimental classical guitar, which can be assembled in small workshops. 

# Workplan

Our work is organized along two pathways: The builders pathway followed by the players pathway.

The OpenGuitar builders pathway has a focus on STEAM education (science, technology, engineering, arts and math) for children and teenagers from disadvantaged backgrounds, including children with disabilities, marginalised children and those living in humanitarian and emergency settings. 

# About us


We are Fernando Bravo, a cognitive neuroscientist working on music technology and Torsten Goerke, a technologist working on research data infrastructure. We joined forces to empower music educators all over the world by making high quality instruments available to them for teaching music students.

# Outlook

Building a cyber-physical commons infrastructure for the OpenGuitar ecosystem is challenging. With Alas DAO we are working to create a Cyber Physical Commons for OpenGuitar. We are a community of researchers and artists who want to reduce the impact of data monopolies in the realm of cyber-physical systems. Our community members share a mission to create digital public goods and sustain their use. Please help us to get OpenGuitar into the world!

column15: Let's demystify crypto and web3 in Africa
column16:
If they say that **crypto is meant to unbank the unbanked**, then Africa is a great place to start. Unfortunately without education, a lot of people are going to be left behind. We want to change this narrative. 

# The Problem #

Misinformation spreading on the African continent in regard to what the blockchain is, how crypto works and finally what web3 is has created distrust amongst people and in turn is going to slow down the adoption of this technology. 

Time and time again we hear people say **"Do Your Own Research DYOR"** but quite frankly if a vast majority of people in this part of the world have the time and resources to gain knowledge about the traditional financial systems, how can one expect them to start investing time to learn extensively about this emerging technology when even people in more advanced countries like the US such as the SEC chair don't fully understand how to classify if an asset like Ethereum is a security or a commodity. 

# The Sats Solution  #

A one-stop centre where you can learn about what is happening in the crypto industry, how cryptocurrencies, blockchain and web3 work and even raise requests for us to help you DYOR. 

As Satsdaily, we have realized that the blockchain is a technology that Africa cannot evade.  We have therefore set out to demystify what it is. 

# How we are doing this  #

- Providing relevant news of worldwide significance to Africans so that they are up to date with the current developments in the industry. 

- Monitoring players trying to penetrate the African space and warning people if we notice any red flags. 

- Providing educational articles that can help our readers to learn about the industry. 

- Hosting meetups in schools to teach young people about various concepts of the industry. 

- Mentoring upcoming developers and helping them find resources that can help them build in this industry such that there are more use cases for crypto. 

- Engaging with key government stakeholders to inform them about the industry, the risks and benefits and direct on formulating better regulatory procedures.

column15: Learning Data Science on the Ethereum Blockchain with @omnianalytics
column16:
We want to share our joy of data science with the Ethereum eco-system through an informative set of online courses and case studies that merge data analysis, blockchain analytics and statistical programming.



We aspire to create a modular online course to help new blockchain developers understand the principles and best practices of data science. Using open data sources from across the Ethereum landscape (think DefiLlama, UniSwap, & Etherscan), the course will teach the topics of data munging, data visualization, exploratory data analysis, machine learning, and dabble in a bit of deep learning and artificial intelligence. As the course grows, we intend to create case studies around how to apply data science to specific DApps (think machine learning techniques for predicting markets with Numer.ai data or analyzing traits in Hashmasks).



Our ultimate vision is to spur and inspire the next generation of developers through interesting applications of data science to emerging blockchain technologies.



Course Link: https://github.com/Omni-Analytics-Group/eth-data-science-course


Course Outline
üíªModule 1 - Basic Data Structures and Munging

Motivating Example (Slides, Python Slides, Video)
Reading Files (Slides, Python Slides, Video)
Basics (Slides, Video)
Data structures (Slides, Video)


Data Sources: CryptoPunks, Crypto Art Pulse



üìä Module 2 - Statistical Graphics and Visualization

Why graph?
Visualization Principles and Practices
Plotting Basics
Building Plots Layer by Layer
Polishing Your Graphs


Data Sources: Omni Analytics Group, CryptoPunks



ü§ñ Module 3 - Supervised and Unsupervised Machine Learning

The ML workflow
Supervised learning for classification
Unsupervised learning for grouping
Forecasting what's next
Deep learning for sequences


Data Sources: Omni Analytics Group



üí° Module 4 - Case Studies

Clustering and segmenting Ethereum validator performance (R, Python, Video)
Visualizing slashings in the Ethereum Medalla testnet (R, Python)
Reconstructing the Crypto Sentiment Investment Curve in ggplot2
Interacting with and Analyzing Numerai Network Growth with GraphQL and ggplot2
Tornado.Cash Initial Distribution Analysis
Stable Coin Analysis
Using R Shiny to explore Numerai tournament data (Part 1, Part 2, Part 3, Part 4, Part 5, Part 6, Part 7, Part 8, Part 9)
Crypto Punks NFT Value Analysis (Slides, Video)
Hashmask Rarity Analysis (Slides, Video)
Geocoding and Mapping Cryptojobs (Slides, Video)
Cryptojobs Exploratory Data Analysis (Slides, Video)
Making Graphs fun with BadgerDAO
An Exploratory Data Analysis of PoolTogether
An Exploratory Data Analysis of Yearn.Finance
Interacting with the Covalent API via httr
Analyzing the Ethereum Name Service (ENS) (Slides)
Forecasting the Trend in Bitcoin Dominance (Slides)
An Analysis of the Uniswap Platform (Slides)
Forefront Social Token Analysis (Slides)
Gitcoin Grants Analysis (Slides)
Predicting Growth in L2 Chains (Slides)
A Statistical Dive into the Unlock Protocol (Slides, Video)
Filecoin Miner Index API Exploration (Slides)
Uniswap Airdrop Liquidity Provider Analysis (Slides)
Uniswap Governance Analysis (Slides)


Data Sources:  Beaconscan, Numerai Tournament Data, Haskmasks, Crypto Punks, Crypto Jobs, PoolTogether, BadgerDAO, Yearn Finance, ENS, Uniswap, Unlock Protocol, Optimisim, ForeFront, Filecoin



üíú Module  5 - Understanding and Defending Gitcoin

Quadratic Funding in the Wild: A Post-Round Analysis of Gitcoin‚Äôs Fund Matching Mechanism (Slides)
Gitcoin Grants Analysis (Slides)


Data Sources: Gitcoin, Omni Analytics Group



üéÅ Lagniappe



The Omniacs‚Äô Data Science Code Snippet Tweet Book Vol 1
Kids Data Collection Worksheet



Updates

Gitcoin Grant Round 8



Like everything else in the world, 2020 flipped our course development plans upside down. Instead of building the course from the bottom up, we chose to repurpose and refactor our Medalla research into motivating case studies on how to perform data analysis on Ethereum 2.0 blockchain data. The case studies walk through, in detail, how we performed the analysis that ultimately netted us a bronze prize. We also included a tutorial on how to use R Shiny as an exploration tool for understanding the Numer.ai dApp's tournament data.



üìù Change log

Restructured the repository for clarity
Added 3 case studies


Gitcoin Grants Round 9



For Round 9 we've doubled down on our "case study first" approach to teaching data science using projects on the Ethereum blockchain as examples. This update includes a look at NFTs, stable coins, market capitalization estimation, and an introduction to GraphQL. We expanded two of our original case studies to include Python version, so if you are interested in learning more about that language you can check those out here and here. This update also includes our first attempt at creating video lectures for the eager learners who would like to dive deeper into the concepts. We intend to use funding from this round to further expand the set of case studies we produce and improve the quality of our video content.



üìù Change log

Major update to the course aesthetics
Module 1 updated
5 New case studies (with 2 more to be published during the active grant round)
First video lecture published to Youtube


Gitcoin Grants Round 10



This round update had us working with our first outside contributor. @Amelia188 gave our course a proper copy edit by fixing tons of typos, correcting grammar errors and improving the overall readability of the material. We look forward to her continued contributions and encourage others to reach out to us about opportunities to collaborate. To further expand out the base content for the course, we completed the material for the second module that focuses on statistical graphics. Other updates for this round include two NFT related case studies and a host of new video lectures. Your support for this round will help us expand our contributor pool and further improve on the quality of our content.



üìù Change log

Tons of copy edits
4 Video lectures for Module 1 have been published
Slides for Module 2 - Statistical Graphics and Visualization have been completed
2 NFT related case studies were created and videos produced

Gitcoin Grants Round 11



We've been busy! Over the last quarter we've been working with DAOs to help them understand their data and it has been this work that inspired us to create two new case studies all about blockchain jobs using data from Cryptojobs. In addition to these two case studies, we've included another one on Yearn.Finance created by our newest collaborator @vintro. This update also includes 3 new videos to supplement the case studies. As usual, we really appreciate the support and contributions this round will help us find and compensate additional course contributors.



üìù Change log

3 video lectures
3 New case studies
Various copy edits


Gitcoin Grants Round 12



Our update for this round is on the smaller side. We have fixed a few links and added a couple of case new case studies. If you can, be a little patient with us. We're going to try to come back with some big updates for the next round. Stay tuned!



üìù Change log

2 New case studies
Various link fixes and copy edits


Gitcoin Grants Round 13



In addition to making progress on Module 3, we've doubled down on our cross-platform initiative to include more Python coded examples. We now have the first two sections of Module 1 translated into Python. A special shout out to @JSchoonmaker! Stay tuned because we're actually going to be updating the course throughout this round.



üìù Change log

Added a Python tutorials for Module 1
Updates to Module 3 (sit tight!)
Various link fixes and copy edits


Gitcoin Grants Round 14



We‚Äôre bouncing all around for this season! The new case studies for this round touch on forecasting L2 contract deployment, exploring ENS domain names, characterizing Filecoin miners, understanding Unlock Protocol contract interactions, and analyzing Uniswap with the uniswappeR package. We‚Äôll be updating throughout the period so don‚Äôt be too surprised if a few new case studies or additional content pops up out of nowhere! Also, we don't want to forget to extend kudos to @NadiaAntony for her course content contributions!



üìù Change log

5+ new Case Studies
Various link fixes and copy edits
Minor updates to Module 3


Gitcoin Grant Round 15 and Beta Round

This round we've decided to experiment with a little bit of alternative styled content! In the lagniappe folder you'll find a compilation "Tweet Book" of R programming related tweets from our Twitter. As our first foray into children's content, we created a data collection worksheet that has young, budding data scientists describing crypto currency logos in spreadsheet form. It should be a short, fun exercise for anyone getting used to how data is structured. We've also included two new Uniswap-centric case studies, one of which won an award for most insightful analysis of the protocol's governance. With that, we hope you enjoy this update!



üìù Change log

2 new Case Studies
Added our first kids data collection worksheet
Added Vol. 1 of our quick stats "Tweet book"
Various link fixes




FAQ

Do you all have experience in this stuff?

Why yes, we do! Omni Analytics Group is a team of PhD level statistical consultants that have been teaching and solving difficult data science problems for nearly a decade. We are passionate about data science and blockchain technologies. Just check out our twitter.



Do I need any prior experience before taking this course?

Our intention is to start from the beginning and build up not only your data chops, but your statistical intuition and programming knowledge. At the end of these courses, you should be able to match a statistical technique to a blockchain data problem, write a basic script to analyze it and confidently search online for more advanced knowledge.



What programming languages will the course focus on?

We'll initially focus on the statistical language R, but then expand to Python. As the course grows, we hope to include examples with contracts written in Solidity.



Can I request a topic?

Sure! Once we flesh out the initial course material. If funding persists, we'd be more than happy to take suggestions on case studies or topics.


Testimonials

"This course is like a rain following a drought. It kindly walks you through the process starting from the use of R to introduction of graphs and machine learning concepts with interesting case studies. I strongly recommend it not only to researchers interested in Ethereum blockchain but also to any students or professionals that have interest in learning data analysis and science." - Will Shin (Principal Economist at Klaytn)


Impact and Accolades


March 11th, 2022 - 59 Stars - 16 Forks
June 8th, 2022     - 76 Stars - 17 Forks
Sept 6th, 2022     - 90 Stars - 21 Forks
April 16th, 2023  - 101 Stars - 25 Forks


Featured Projects


CryptoPunks
Crypto Art Pulse
Numerai
Tornado Cash
Hashmasks
Cryptojobs
BadgerDAO
Yearn.Finance
Covalent
PoolTogether
ENS
Unlock Protocol
Filecoin
Optimism
Polygon
Uniswap
Gitcoin

column16:
Women Biz is a community of women empowering women through the web3.
We are a team of 20 ambassadors representing us across the country and more than 100 active women participating in our events.

Would you like to help us impact more women? Our next project is focused on carrying out free courses that open the doors to Web 3, even if they don‚Äôt know anything about this world.
We want at least 10 women from different cities outside of Lima participating.

The methodology is: 
Block 1: Introduction to web 3, history and use cases. 
Block 2: Basic concepts about metaverse, networks, Ethereum, Celo, Gitcoin, L2, smart contracts, tokens. 
Block3: Developing a web3 project

We will work together to continue promoting the participation of women in web3, Blockchain and the Gitcoin ecosystem.

Another objective is for more women to present their projects and be able to access funds from the Gitcoin ecosystem.

The public good is Education


We sustain ourselves thanks to the support of local communities and DAOS:

*AndinoDao: Network and presence in social media
*NTT Data: Place to organize our events
*Local entrepreneurships leaded for women: Merch and gifts to our team. 

But all of those are¬¥nt enough to make our project become to reality. For that we are applying to the Gitcoin grants.

We are Andino, a community of web3 developers and creators. We promote education and entrepreneurship in emerging technologies such as blockchain.

We carry out events such as meetups, workshops and hackathons, collaborating with educational entities such as universities to onboard university students to start their career as web3 creators.
