column16:
## Proposal Summary

Web3Domains.com is a dedicated independent content platform, focused on providing timely news and educational guides about the ever-evolving Web3 landscape. But with your help we can be so much more!

Our primary goal is to address the challenges of "findability" for Web3 content, by people looking for facts and information via Google Organic Search, SEO and SEM. We want the important news and stories, (which are happening in the obscure parts of Web3), to be found by people searching via Web2.

We seek grant funding from the Gitcoin Grants program to empower our independent content creation efforts, to empower thought leaders as authors, while driving awareness and adoption of Web3 technologies, product/ service benefits, and success stories.

## Objective

Our objective is to establish Web3Domains.com as the go-to resource for information on decentralized domains and Web3 identity.

We aim to simplify the discovery process for users, and working with Web3 thought leaders to create high-quality content, for SEO optimization, and engage the Web3 community through traditional Web2 SEM, such as social media discussions and interactive events.

By amplifying our efforts, we aspire to foster a thriving ecosystem of informed and empowered Web3 users and authors.

## The Problem & Our Solution

The lack of easily discoverable and quality content about Web3 poses a significant barrier for new users entering the Web3 space.

As more individuals and organizations seek to explore Web3 identity and decentralized domains, it is essential to provide them with accurate and helpful content, including the stories and background on Web3 success.

Web3Domains.com addresses this challenge by working with Web3 thought leaders and paying them for producing and publishing informative content for Web3 users, while optimizing for search engines like Google and DuckDuckGo.

Our solution centers around driving awareness, increasing desired-searchable information communities and audiences are looking for, while creating a hub for community discussion and education for users and new thought leaders.

## Accomplishments & Strategic Assets

Web3Domains.com's soft launch has been met with success, as we have connected with numerous independent Web3 content creators and published a couple dozen articles from ten different writers and reporters.

This effort has contributed to the growth of the Web3 industry, by providing very valuable content and context on key subjects.

Our premium domain name asset, Web3Domains.com, serves as a strategic advantage, as it contains the "exact match SEO keyword" to help users find key content via Google Search, (as naming, domains, and identity is part of every Web3 project and organization).

## Grant Proposal

With the support of Gitcoin Grants program, Web3Domains.com intends to:

1. **Empower Independent Content Creation**: Allocate funding to pay independent content writers and human resources to produce high-quality articles, news, and guides about the intersection between the Metaverse, NFTs, and decentralized domains and web3 identity.

2. **Enhance SEO, SEM and Visibility**: Optimize content for search engines to improve visibility and reach for Web3-related topics (to get found in Web2); ensuring that new and existing users can easily find relevant, reliable, and informative content.

3. **Engage the Community**: Host social-audio discussions via Twitter spaces, Podcasts, and other speaking opportunities, to engage the Web2/Web3 community, facilitate knowledge-sharing, and raise awareness for decentralized identity and Web3 technologies.

4. **Build Partnerships**: Collaborate with Web2/Web3 industry leaders, organizations, and content creators to expand our network and strengthen the impact of our educational and informational efforts.

## Project Team

 - Gary Palmer Jr. (GaryPalmerJr.eth), CEO [@GaryPalmerJr](https://twitter.com/GaryPalmerJr)
 - Adriana Skura-Palmer (Ada.eth; UnfoldedLife.eth), COO [@UnfoldedLife](https://twitter.com/UnfoldedLife)

Our management team brings a wealth of experience in marketing, sales, business development, technology, and the blockchain-crypto and Web3-NFT industries. This expertise will be invaluable in executing our mission and achieving our vision.

## Conclusion & Gratitude

Web3Domains.com is committed to becoming the trusted source for decentralized domains and Web3 education. We believe in the transformative potential of Web3 technologies and are passionate about empowering users to navigate this emerging landscape with values that are: 
 - Revolutionary, 
 - Immutable, 
 - Public-verifiable, 
 - Collaborative (& community-based), 
 - Open (accessible, global & borderless),
 - Resistant-to-censorship, and of,
 - Decentralization. 

By producing accessible and engaging content, we aim to bridge knowledge gaps, foster a sense of community, and contribute to the growth and success of the Web3 ecosystem.

As we embark on this journey, we are grateful for the opportunity to collaborate with Gitcoin Grants and the broader Web3 community. Your support will enable us to hire new independent thought leaders (to get paid to publish their content), and to amplify the impact and our reach to a wider audience of new individuals and organizations, interested and searching for the world of Web3, decentralized identity, and beyond.

Every contribution, no matter how small, will play a vital role in advancing our mission and bringing our vision to fruition. We humbly request your consideration in granting funding to the Web3Domains.com project. 

Together, we can strengthen the Web3 community and pave the way for a more decentralized, inclusive, and innovative future. Thank you for reviewing our proposal and for your thoughtful consideration. 

We appreciate your support and look forward to building a brighter Web3 world together.

With gratitude, 
The Web3Domains.com Team

column15: Crypto Altruism ‚Äì Accessible Web3 Education for Nonprofits and Changemakers
column16:
**TLDR**

_Let‚Äôs show the world the good of Web3._

This project will help onboard the next generation of Changemakers and Nonprofits to Web3. Funding from the Gitcoin Beta Round will support the development of a Web3 Changemaker Toolkit and build our capacity to support Nonprofits, grassroots movements, and activists interested in using the power of Web3 to change the world.




**About Crypto Altruism**

[Crypto Altruism](https://www.cryptoaltruism.org/) is a content platform dedicated to showing the world the good of crypto, blockchain, and Web3! Through our [podcast](https://www.cryptoaltruism.org/podcast) and [blog](https://www.cryptoaltruism.org/), we‚Äôve released 100 podcast episodes, over 200 blog posts, and have interviewed nearly 100 pioneering leaders in the web3 social impact space. Crypto Altruism is a leader in supporting non-profits and social impact leaders with education on how they can utilize web3 tools to advance their movements of change.

There is unfortunately a lot of negativity going around about crypto, and we‚Äôre trying our best to shift this narrative by showing the world that Web3 is good. By supporting the movement, it will help get this message in front of as many people as possible.

Check out [our website](https://www.cryptoaltruism.org/) to learn all there is to know about Crypto Altruism!



**Our impact so far**

Crypto Altruism was launched in May 2021 and has been bootstrapped into a leading platform uplifting the Web3 social impact community with high quality content and engaging dialogue on the power of Web3 to build a better world.

Here are some of our key milestones so far:

- The release of 100 podcast episodes featuring interviews with pioneering social impact Changemakers in Web3

- The publication of 200+ articles highlighting the social impact use cases of Blockchain

- The creation of dozens of resources for Nonprofits and Changemakers

We have an ambitious plan to grow the movement, reach new audiences, and help Nonprofits and social impact pioneers turn their education into action and actively build in the Web3 ecosystem.

![enter image description here](https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/60103d3eeea7a74ecd224670/af8b0303-dd73-41ab-ad23-5a76774d6bdb/Crypto+Altruism+Podcast.PNG?format=1000w)



**Where your funding will go**

To date, Crypto Altruism has been 100% bootstrapped. With your help, we‚Äôll build off our proven track record in the Web3 social impact community, and build our long-term capacity to onboard and support Nonprofits and Changemakers in Web3.

Specific deliverables for this grant will include:

- **Deliverable # 1 ‚Äì Web3 Changemaker Toolkit** - Developing a Web3 Changemaker Toolkit that contains educational content, resources, and case studies for Nonprofits, grassroots organizations, and Changemakers who are interested in using Web3 to advance their cause. It will serve as a one-stop shop for Nonprofits and Changemakers looking to use Web3 tools to grow their movements.

- **Deliverable # 2 ‚Äì Re-design of Crypto Altruism Content Hub** - Re-designing and re-launching the Crypto Altruism site to create a true hub for the exchange of ideas on Web3 social impact. The result will be a more accessible experience for those looking to learn about the social impact potential of Web3 while allowing for additional integrations including free online courses, sharable infographics, and a versatile database of Web3 social impact projects.

- **Deliverable # 3 ‚Äì Special podcast series focused on Nonprofits in Web3** - Funding the release of a special, 10-part Crypto Altruism Podcast series interviewing 10 pioneering Nonprofit leaders who have successfully used Web3 tools to advance their cause.

![enter image description here](https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/60103d3eeea7a74ecd224670/a4a52b97-58be-479f-a2be-903701870fcf/CryptoAltruism-Infographics.PNG?format=500w)




**How your funding will elevate the Web3 social impact ecosystem**

Your support will help uplift the burgeoning community of Changemakers using Web3 to drive social impact and build a better world.

This project will help:

- Create an accessible on-ramp for Nonprofits interested in engaging with Web3.

- Onboard more changemakers into Web3, helping lead to greater adoption in traditional impact spaces.

- Drive greater inclusion in Web3 by breaking down the barriers to entry for those in the Nonprofit sector, especially smaller grassroots organizations.

- Build the capacity of the Web3 social impact community by providing useful resources and building a network of Changemakers dedicated to using the power of Web3 to build a better world.

- Enable the sharing of best practices related to Web3 and social impact.




**Roadmap**

Q2 2023

- Consult with Nonprofits and Web3 impact leaders to inform the design of the toolkit and the re-designed content hub website.

- Begin development of Web3 Changemaker Toolkit.

- Recruit guests for 10-part Crypto Altruism Nonprofit podcast series.

Q3 2023

- Redesign of Crypto Altruism content hub

- Publish first 5 episodes of Crypto Altruism Nonprofit podcast series

Q4 2023

- Relaunch of Crypto Altruism website

- Launch Beta Version of Web3 Changemaker Toolkit

- Publish last 5 episodes of Crypto Altruism Nonprofit podcast series




**Get In Touch!**

Have questions? Check out [cryptoaltruism.org](https://www.cryptoaltruism.org/), and make sure to follow-up on [Twitter](https://twitter.com/Crypto_Altruism), [LinkedIn](https://www.linkedin.com/company/crypto-altruism), and [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/cryptoaltruism/). Our DMs are always open! Alternatively, you can reach Crypto Altruism‚Äôs Founder directly at [info@cryptoaltruism.org](mailto:info@cryptoaltruism.org). Thank you for your support, and please reach out to let us know why you chose to support us!

column16:
Mujeres en Crypto is a community where women from different cities of LATAM and Spain and different backgrounds get together for one interest in common: Blockchain technology.
Mujeres en Crypto does different meetups online and offline to educate and encourage the female leadership.
We also support each other through mentorships and originating spaces where everyone has a fundamental rol and active in the construction of the ecosystem.
Nowadays in Latin America a small percentage of women invest in crypto and even less work in the industry.

Women have been hearing the word NO for too long when it comes to finance and technology, most of them aren't even trying to understand the ecosystem because society always said that these industries are only for men.

We want to disrupt the ecosystem and see more women in leadership positions and contributing to the growth of the blockchain technology.

# **TL;DR** 

Join a global community designing safer, token-gated experiences for women at live music events, starting with an **upcoming music festival in partnership with Budweiser India** üçª

# **Why here? Why now?**
With a mere 5% of global festivals produced by women and 40% of women facing harassment at live events there's no better time to tackle the glaring issues of gender disparity and safety in live music. Heck, [even the UN is doing something about it](https://www.unwomenuk.org/safe-spaces-in-music/) üá∫üá≥

HER Tribe is a decentralized community of women dedicated to providing a platform to implement material change in the live events space. We‚Äôre capitalizing on the momentum generated by other trailblazing women in web3, using blockchain to create secure, enjoyable spaces for all to experience the magic of live events. Golly, a real life use case! ü•π

# How? Empower the HER Tribe Community

## ü™ü NFT-Gated Web Platform
We've secured the developers necessary to begin building a HER Tribe web portal with all necessary DAO tooling & gated by a PFP collection. 
*(Est. $15,000, Q2)*

## üè™ IRL Event Station 
We'll trial our first pop-up for women at a music festival this summer in partnership with Budweiser, providing essential services like certified nurses, counselors, medical equipment, drug testing kits, and tech-enabled solutions for reporting emergencies and harassment. 
*(Est. $15,000, Q3)*

## üëØ Dedicated Community Managers
We‚Äôve lined up two initial community managers for six months to support both the community and live events segment. 
*(Est. $10,000, Q2)*

## ‚õ≤ Educational Content and Grant Pool
We'll create educational content focused on upskilling women in web3 for event safety. Remaining funds will form a grant pool for HER Tribe members to propose and execute community improvement initiatives. 
*(Est. $10,000, Q3)*

## @Gitcoin Community let's get ourselves right ahead of the summer!

column16:
# Summary 

The DAOVOZ Collective aims to build a DAO of DAOs. Our mission is to increase public awareness of DAOs, and the potential impact of decentralised communities globally, while increasing the diversity of the voices present in the ecosystem, and holding space for new voices to lead in the conversations held.  

We are seeking Gitcoin grants funding to provide scholarships to individuals to participate in DAOVOZ: The Web3 Forum 2024, in person, during the World Economic Forum (WEF) in Switzerland. Moreover we wish to grow the DAOVOZ collective, and start operating as a formal DAO, opening membership, and selecting speakers and scholars for the forum democratically.

# Background 

Current globally recognised events heavily prioritise corporate sponsors as ‚Äãspeakers, leading to a bias towards speakers and thinkers ‚Äãwho are financially more advantaged, and perpetuating ‚Äãbiases and opaque ‚Äòin-group‚Äô networks that optimise not for ‚Äãmerit but for privilege. DAOVOZ proposes to form a ‚Äãcollective of mission-aligned DAOs to transparently, ‚Äãinclusively and democratically curate events and speakers, and advocate for DAOs on the global political stage.

To advocate for and advance this mission, DAOVOZ aims to form a continuous presence of DAO leaders and curate thought-provoking discussion during one of the most important gatherings of political actors, activists and capital allocators: the World Economic Forum in Davos, Switzerland for its annual summit.

In 2023, we hosted the first edition of DAOVOZ, together with FTW DAO, CV Labs, Tokentus Investment, Hyphen Global, Foresight Institute, Greenmining DAO, Bankless DAO, Redhill Media, DAO Suisse, and others. Following this successful launch, the community hosted additional side events, in TelAviv and at ETH Denver, to promote its mission in partnership with Collider VC, Safe, BitDAO, DeepDAO, DoinGud, MarketAcross, PizzaDAO, etc.

# About DAOVOZ 

The DAOVOZ Collective aims to build a DAO of DAOs. Our mission is to increase public awareness of DAOs, and the potential impact of decentralised communities globally, while increasing the diversity of the voices present in the ecosystem, and holding space for new voices to lead in the conversations held.  We are seeking Gitcoin grants funding to provide scholarships to individuals to participate in DAOVOZ: The Web3 Forum 2024, in person, during the World Economic Forum (WEF) in Switzerland. Moreover we wish to grow the DAOVOZ collective, and start operating as a formal DAO, opening membership, and selecting speakers and scholars for the forum democratically.

# DAOVOZ: The Web3 Forum

DAOVOZ is a series of events, curated by the DAOVOZ community. The DAOVOZ collective is a DAO of DAOs and individuals, whose mission it is to surface DAO voices and to create a new and equitable culture of events and speaker curation, while advocating for web3 and DAOs. 
 
DAOVOZ instigates debates on the present and future of DAOs, looking into aspects related to:
- Work & Education
- Finance & financial systems 
- Health, wellness & longevity
- Media, creators, and communities
- Sustainable living & ecosystems

All the agenda, conversations held, activities performed, decisions taken, and supporting documentation will be shared publicly as per the community's ethos. The related action plans and resource allocations will be also tracked openly ensuring accountability and progress are made towards the organisation‚Äôs goals and future gatherings.

## Milestones completed:
- Build community of 300+ DAO contributors 
- Launch event: DAOVOZ 2023
- First side events run by community members (Tel Aviv, Denver)

## Next Milestones:
- Establish DAOVOZ Governance v1 as a steward of the -collective
- DAOVOZ 2024 edition (January 2024 during the WEF)
- Offer scholarships to attend and speak at the DAOVOZ 2024 edition
- Select scholars with our 2024 membership community
- Establish and deepen relations with think tanks, policy and industry leaders attending WEF to advocate for DAOs and Web3

# About Us

The collective behind DAOVOZ seeks to represent leading DAOs and individuals, each on a mission to bring positive change to society and our environment by surfacing and amplifying the most suitable and impactful voices and ideas in the web3 space, in an effort to actively shape society and world we envision living in. DAOs and our collective minds offer the potential to unlock a multiverse of endeavours that create a dramatic change in the current mise-en-sc√®ne.

As of today, DAOVOZ is operating under the legal umbrella of FTW DAO and the FTW Association. On the run up to DAOVOZ 2024 and the World Economic Forum, one of our milestones is to register DAOVOZ as its own legal entity, and give the community full independence.

# Track Record 

## Events:
- Half/day event held in Davos during World Economic Forum 2023 for 100+ attendees that were attending the Forum
- Half/day builder focused event in Tel Aviv during Ethereum Tel Aviv with 70+ attendees 
- Sponsored an event in Denver for DAO builders alongside Pizza DAO, Safe and others

## Media: 
1. https://thedefiant.io/the-future-of-daos-takes-center-stage-in-tel-aviv
2. https://de.beincrypto.com/daovoz-veranstaltung-bringt-die-stimmen-von-web3-und-daos-zum-wef-zusammen/ (in German)
3. Community: telegram group 305 DAO leaders and contributors as members
4. https://www.daovoz.org


# Rationale

## Benefits supporting DAOVOZ:
- Drive the positive narrative and expose the potential of DAOs and Web3 to a wider audience of change-makers, advocating for DAO-friendly policy and shaping mainstream media, business and public opinions
- Help public-policy makers understand the potential of DAOS and web3
- Drive progress towards web3-based solutions to critical problems like climate change, and onboard additional people who have the ideas, position or capital to support the web3 ecosystem in gaining traction at greater scale
- Identify, surface and support the most important leaders, thinkers and solution-builders in the web3 space in getting seen and heard on a global stage

### Concrete OKRs could be formed around such things as: 
- the number of projects that we can bring in front of world leaders, policy-makers, philanthropists and investors.
- The number of senior policy-makers present and participating in our sessions alongside DAO leaders
- The diversity of the voices in DAOs that we represent
- The quality and quantity of follow-on conversations and action plans generated with governments, policy-leaders and NGOs
- The quality and reach of positive and thoughtful media and conversations we can generate around web3 and DAOs

# Use of Funds

We intend to use the funds of this grant for three things

## 1. Provide 5 scholarships to DAO contributors to travel to Davos in January: (Cost Estimate 12k)
- Setup of scholarship applications and voting mechanism 
- Travel stay and shuttle for scholarship recipients
- PR support and media for the speakers at DAOVOZ

## 2. Event Location and Operational Expenses: (ca. 50-100k)
- Davos is a small town and event locations are limited and in extremely high demand. 
- Securing a location and speaker accommodation is the thing we have struggled the most with in 2023 given the high costs. 
- We are in talks with a number of events spaces and have the contacts in place to make an event happen in Switzerland as well as a number of our team based in the area who can coordinate
- We intend to allocate some of the grants fund towards the location rent for the event. 
- Quotes for a location per day in Davos range from 50 -100k depending on size, catering and additional AV support 

## 3. Compensation of organising team (optional) (Cost Estimate 8k)
- We intend to discuss with the collective and vote on a financial compensation of the organising team. 
- At a bare minimum we intend to cover the travel expenses and cover their stay. Organising team consists of 6-7 people

column16: DigiCult is the premier community for DigiDaiGaku Genesis holders - The community is currently made up of 600 blue chip holders and 70% of the total supply of DigiDaiGaku Genesis nfts.  Several CEO‚Äôs from companies such as Limitbreak, FreeNFT.com, Crypto Ninja, and MoonPals are members of our community.  Our platform is a tool used to bring continuous value through entertainment and education, back to NFT holders.  This is accomplished through community events, networking with established project leaders and hosting AMA‚Äôs.  DigiCult pays special attention to building relationships with Japanese projects and gaming projects and have assisted teams in executing in this space as they align heavily with our own projects interests.  We invest time networking with projects focused on web3 safety and host workshops with teams such as Pocket Universe to help ensure our community is aware how to protect themselves in this space.  We also use our platform to network with other projects and educate them on the power of free nfts in this space and the value add/trust for their consumers.  This space is largely used as a kickstarter for established web2 companies who already have the capital needed to launch in this space.  We would like to continue to advocate and education why we need that to change.

column16:
A curated group of Ethereum builders creating products, prototypes, and tutorials to enrich the web3 ecosystem.

‚ù§Ô∏è We are an Ethereum public good.

Our stack of choice is Scaffold-Eth2, created by the BuidlGuidl. SE2 uses next.js, Wagmi, RainbowKit, and Typescript to allow for quick prototyping and a clean interface. 

We used scaffold-eth to create speedrunethereum.com, a free on-boarding curriculum to bring new builders into the Ethereum ecosystem.  You will go through a series of challenges that start by teaching basic knowledge like how to get your stack setup and deploy a contract, then continue on with in depth solidity concepts.  Ask for help from real BuidlGuidl members and other builders on the same challenges in our Telegram channels.  When complete you will have created Dapps that are powerful and important in the ecosystem.

After completing the first few challenges you can choose to join the BuidlGuidl!  We will reach out to find your interests and help guide you to new projects, or let you build your own idea. Build some cool things or help out the BuildGuidl in some way and you may get some small Eth scholarships. Keep building things to enrich the ecosystem and we will set you up a stream!  A monthly amount of Eth that you can pull out as you complete projects.

speedrunethereum.com
buidlguidl.com 

Current stats:
710 Builders
79 active ETH streams to builders
353.83 ETH streamed

column16:
# H.E.R. DAO - Web3 womxn builders and founders 


H.E.R DAO is a womxn-centered developer DAO that includes non-binary audiences. Our goal is to sustainably diversify the blockchain ecosystem, leading to more versatile, holistic innovations and increased revenue potential. In other words: we want to build great products that generate revenue and increase equity for everyone!
-----------------------
## What we do

H.E.R DAO aims to pave the way for womxn‚Äôs access into web 3, improving diversity among this space. H.E.R. supports womxn on their way to bring forth new innovations and to set them on a successful path. We organise hands-on activities concerning onboarding and community building, as well as educational and development training for womxn with the goal of them becoming builders and founders. Additionally we sponsor womxn to attend and participate in Web3 Conferences and hackathons around the world, and we teach them how to get the best out of these events! 


## ¬øWhat we‚Äôve done? -  recent milestones
In December 2021, we launched a Scholarship program for women to attend EthDenver during february 2022. We scholared 100 womxn to attend and programmed a successful mini conference in the first women led hacker house in ETH DENVER history! 

üåü13 IRL + 3 remote Hackathons
üåü17 Hackathons
üåü80+ Hackathon project with a 30% continuation rate
üåüMore than 15000+ followers around the world
üåüMore than 500 womxn sponsored that have attended a Web3 Conference or Hackathon and that are building in Web3 (coding, designing, building community, creating content, etc).
üåüMore than 350 womxn that have received workshops and virtual education on crypto, web3, coding and other abilities required.
üåü100% of our scholars win at least one bounty in hackathons.
üåüMore than 200 developers onboarded to web3
üåü10+ Subchapters started on 5 continents

-----------------------
## Problem we are solving: 

Missing diversity/ accessibility in the space 



## Solution:

To address this issue, we have developed a comprehensive approach that focuses on providing education and community support specifically for women and non-binary individuals in the blockchain and cryptocurrency space. Our approach includes bringing more than 600 women to more than 20 hackathons and conferences, which gives scholars and students access to knowledge and networking opportunities.
We also focus on P2P onboarding, particularly through local language and in-person meetups. We believe that this approach is especially crucial for underrepresented groups, who may not have access to online resources or who may feel excluded from online communities. To achieve this goal, we have set up various H.E.R. DAO subnodes in different regions, such as LATAM, Korea, Kenya, India, Turkey, and Europe.
Our subDAOs help us understand the regional applications and adoptions of DAOs, which can inform a global DAO infrastructure that represents intersectional interests. By creating a technology that is representative of intersectional interests, we believe that we can create a more inclusive and diverse global community that can benefit from the potential of blockchain and cryptocurrency technology.

-----------------------
##  Plans for Funding:


with the funding we will build out our internal structure, give initial funding to Sub-DAOs, create educational material, organize meetups, provide mentorship, provide scholarship

- 30% - H.E.R. DAO Global Treasury
- 40% - H.E.R. DAO Sub-Dao Treasury (distributed between H.E.R. DAO Latam, H.E.R. DAO Kenya, H.E.R. DAO Turkey, H.E.R. DAO India and H.E.R. DAO Germany and H.E.R. DAO France measured by community size/ contributions, effort)
- 10% - funding new sub-chapters (e.g. H.E.R. DAO Nigeria, H.E.R. DAO Middle East, H.E.R. DAO Spain)
- 10% - educational efforts (meetups, tutorials, mentorship)
- 10% - building out internal structure


- 10% of the 70% going to the Treasuries will be distributed as scholarships

-----------------------
ROADMAP 2023

- bring 500 scholars to conferences/ hackathons
- onboard 10 new sub-DAOs
- organize 2 hackathons 
- host 40 meetups
- host 2 startup houses


LongTerm Roadmap:

Long term, H.E.R. aims to become the leading launchpad for women-led blockchain ventures. 



-----------------------

Help us keep building and onboarding more womxn into the ecosystem and in more cities around the world! üíú

-----------------------
Join our community!
Telegram H.E.R. DAO  - https://t.me/herdao
Instagram - https://www.instagram.com/h.e.r.dao/?hl=es
Twitter - https://twitter.com/_HerDAO

column16:
# Our Mission

To cultivate a tech ecosystem of Native technologists crafting free and open source technology for Native communities

# Who We Are

A community of Native/Indigenous peoples and allies working to build open source projects, educate Native technologists, and onboard Natives into Web3

# What We Are Working on in 2023

- Lakota AI Code Camp
- 2023 Conference
- Native Job Board
- Organizing members around Regeneration projects
- Governance models, signaling, and voting on proposals
- Crypto education
- Web3 stack education for Web2 developers

# Future Projects

- Upgrade our open source project, "Native-owned Businesses" to use decentralized storage
- Use decentralized storage to preserve Indigenous languages
- Fund open source Web3 projects built by Native technologists to support:
    - Regenerative agroforestry
    - Media + education (e.g. participatory media, nature documentaries, knowledge content, created and distributed by local communities)
    - Local natural research and biolearning
    - Cost-savings on infrastructure like solar panels
    - Land back
    - Tribal Currencies

# Update Apr 17 2023

We continue to onboard Indigenous technologists into our Slack community. For our conference, there was a talk on "Ethics, Education, and Ethereum - What Indian Country needs to know about Crypto". We've also been discussing decentralized data protocols as it relates to the preservation of the language and culture of Indigenous peoples.

column16:
## Summary
The outside world sees crypto as little more than a decentralized casino but an optimistic counternarrative has emerged around the Gitcoin community. This vision, known as the Infinite Garden, reveals that crypto gives us coordination superpowers.

I believe that for the Greenpill mission to succeed, we must amplify regen stories that are informative, fun, and accessible to all.

## Overview
As a former Creative Director with Gitcoin, my art helped fundraise over half a million dollars for the Gitcoin Grants Matching Pool since 2021. My focus on regen fiction has now shifted to cultivating the Infinite Garden vision through fun and accessible lore. In the project I am proposing, Moloch, Ether‚Äôs Phoenix, and the Dark Forest are just the beginning of a new, uplifting mythology represented in the Infinite Garden Library.

Crypto is at a critical inflection point. Your choice to invest in this project will help realize a positive-sum future for the following reasons:

- The next billion crypto users need inspiring and informative stories to guide them through the cryptoverse. Newcomers consistently fall for the same schemes and OGs can do a better job of passing along the wisdom of past cycles. The Infinite Garden mythology will feature relatable characters and lore that orient and guide new adventurers through the cryptoverse.
- The Infinite Garden mirrors reality. Every entry in the library (characters, technology, and environments) also represents a powerful force in the real world.
- New settlers are not the only people confused about web3; many crypto elders are still unaware that ‚ÄúEthereum isn‚Äôt here to make you rich, Ethereum is here to set you free" (Vitalik Buterin). Beliefs motivate behavior and it is essential we make Gitcoin‚Äôs vision clear and attractive.
- Public goods awareness needs to increase in the NFT space. The NFT community has an outsized impact on how the world perceives crypto but our PFP frens are generally oblivious to the regen way. The Gitcoin x MetaLabels drop, Creature World collaboration, and PublicNouns projects have made promising headway and the Infinite Garden Library is the next step to trojan horse our regen crypto values.
- For those of us already Greenpilled: the Infinite Garden represents a celebration of the adventures that have brought us here‚Äìand an inspiring vision of what we hope to buidl together next.

## Specifications
The Infinite Garden Trading Card Game recently received seed funding from Gitcoin [GCP-006]. Funding from this quadratic grant will go to fund the public library of Infinite Garden Lore. More characters, environments, and artifacts that represent the most significant corners of our wild web3 adventure. 

## Bio:
As a Creative Director with Gitcoin, my art helped fundraise over half a million dollars for the Gitcoin Grants Matching Pool since 2021. Ethereum‚Äôs culture and values are central to my creative work and I have continued to dedicate my art sales to funding social causes. I have a proven record of project generation, initiation, development, and completion.
- Infinite Garden Coloring Book (forward by Aya Miyaguchi) - 2023
- Gitcoin Creative Director (NFT fundraisers for Gitcoin Grants) - 2021-2022
- Spider-Man Character Artist (Sony) - 2018-2021

column16:
‚ÅâÔ∏è Why?

- Average salary of a Certified Scrum Master in the United States is around $98,000 per year (average in US - 2021)
- While women are underrepresented in SCRUM master roles, they tend to make more than their male counterparts in the US (2021), meaning there is an opportunity for upward mobility (source)
- Having different builders across in the Web3 space is difficult to coordinate, need for Web3 native PMs
- Current PM programs lack knowledge of Web3 specific tools
- Traditional industry wide accepted certifications are not utilized for token gating DAOs
- To renew certification, Scrum Masters need to donate their time to nonprofits
- Their is no Web3 program that gives traditional industry certs on chain
- Lack of Web3 scrum community to connect and support each other


üèÉ‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è About SCRUM DAO ->

SCRUM DAO is a decentralized autonomous organization that was recently formed to train and certify the next generation of SCRUM masters and professionals. The DAO will operate using Agile SCRUM methodology, leading project management tools, and leverage Web3 technology via a project based approach to learning. The long-term goal of the DAO is to place certified SCRUM masters into high paying roles for decentralized organizations



‚ù§Ô∏è Values ->

- üí∏ Opportunities: we value placing graduated in high paying roles
- üéì Relevant Skills: Both learning traditional project management and teach Web3 nativeness
- ‚ôªÔ∏è Sustainable: generating a path towards scalable cohorts, membership, and revenue model to transition from non-profit initiative to onchain DAO¬†
- üíº Education: software engineering, Web3, and project management is still a relatively new field, as new tools come out, we aim to be a professional organization aiming to educate each other through knowledge share with the industry‚Äôs latest tech

üéØ Objectives->

- Train and certify upcoming SCRUM masters and certified SCRUM professionals
- Utilize Agile SCRUM methodology and Daily SCRUMs for conducting DAO operations
- Build a system for placing certified SCRUM masters into work for decentralized organizations
- Build a standard for on chain for ACSM/CSM/PSM/PMP certifications and use as basis for DAO reputation and roles
- Onboard PMs to Web3 based project management tools
- Plan Open Sprints using project based learning approach¬† by building decentralized technology, document SOPs on chain

üìàOKRs (Objectives and Key Results + Key Performance Indicators) ->
- Number of enrolled students that get CSM Certified
- Number of graduated students placed in role / time to hire
- Number of SCRUM certified hours completed
- Number of cohorts quarterly / students per cohort
- Time to complete a certification/user
-Retention rate of students into further programs and instructor roles
- Number of certified SCRUM masters tokenizing their certs / admission into DAO
- Number of instructors onboarded to teach SCRUM EDUCATION Provider courses
- Total revenue (including funding & course enrollment) -> when onchain treasury for DAO is live
- Adoption rate of the on-chain treasury system



üí∏ Funding ->
We are seeking funding to expand our initiative of developing dedicated SCRUM certified instructors, certifying select cohorts, and integrating on-chain credentials for SCRUM certification for DAO admission. Our vision is to establish a talent pipeline, revenue generation for courses, and accredited SCRUM Alliance hours for existing certified Masters within an on-chain SCRUM DAO.

To achieve this goal, we require additional funding to support marketing efforts for recruitment of cohorts, business development for partnerships with recruiters, PM software, and Web3 organizations. This funding will enable us to bootstrap our initiative and create a sustainable business model that benefits the SCRUM community.

With your support, we aim to provide a platform for existing SCRUM professionals to leverage their certification for admission into our DAO, get paid for instructing courses, opportunities for roles, or earn elevated certifications. Our non-profit status allows us to leverage in-kind donations and direct donations to further support our mission.


Together, we can create a decentralized ecosystem that supports the growth and development of SCRUM professionals in the Web3 space.

¬†Additionally with non-profit status we will be leveraging in-kind donations and donations directly https://www.minorityaccelerator.com/donate¬†



üì£ Call to Action
- Other than donating here is what we need from the community.
- Certified Scrum Masters (sign up today at ScrumDAO.org)
- Marketing & Social media Managers, help us promote this initiative¬†
- Additional Students to Join Study Group & Be A Champion¬†
- Pick up a task today on our Wonderverse at https://app.wonderverse.xyz/organization/scrumdao/boards?entity=milestone¬†¬†


üëÄ What Exists ->

Currently students from Duke University, and past MPA Cohort graduates have been self organizing for study groups on discord to get CSM certified, working with Web3 project management platforms like Wonderverse & Charmverse,¬† planning open sprints, and being placed in Web3 projects.



üîÆNext Steps/Project Timeline

Check out all major milestones on Wonderverse https://app.wonderverse.xyz/organization/scrumdao/boards?entity=milestone¬†


- Start Daily SCRUMs with Study groups (first¬† month)
- üåï Plan open sprints. Case study 1: NEAR Blockchain Operating System. nearbuilders.com/gateway-sprint (first month)
- Recruitment of certified SCRUM masters to act as instructors and mentors (first two months)
- Sponsor cohort to take CSM certs (first 3 months)¬†
- Seed partnerships with Web3 Project Management tools (first 3 months)
- Become a Scrum Education Provider (REP) recognized by the Scrum Alliance (first 6 months)
- Deployment of the DAO with subgroups for different roles on mainnet (first 6 months)
- Development and deployment of the on-chain certification system (ACSM/CSM/PSM/PM) within DAO based membership (first 6 months).
- Scale with paid courses pipelining to DAO treasury (first 1 year)
- Partner with traditional Web2 organizations like CGI for talent pipeline (first 6 months)
- Pipeline graduates into becoming certified SCRUM instructors with career opportunities int traditional tech and Web3 space (first year)



üåà Who‚Äôs Building This ->
This is a continuation of the MPA Educational Cohort‚Äôs PM Track, but now turned into a spin out DAO program. ‚Äú2023 is the YEAR of DAO! Following the success of our educational cohort over the past two years, we are excited to announce the launch, SCRUM DAO.‚Äù - Shot, President of Minority Programmers

Past Gitcoin Grant¬† https://gitcoin.co/grants/7206/minority-programmers-educational-cohort¬†

This is an initiative of Minority Programmers Association (MPA) Educational Cohort, launched as a program through Minority Think Tank Foundation a 501c3 Non Profit (EIN - 86-3949072)

MPA (minorityprogrammers.org) is an educational organization that focuses on creating equal opportunities in web3 for talented individuals through a project based approach to learning regardless of race, religion, or residence. Our previous educational cohorts have been successful in training the next generation of developers, managers, and marketers, placing graduated in companies like NASA, AWS, SalesForce, Holaplex, Booz Allen Hamilton, Zoom, and Leidos to name a few.

üìö Resources

- Wonderverse https://app.wonderverse.xyz/organization/scrumdao/¬†¬†
- Discord https://discord.gg/UK4bxrf8Y7
- Website https://ScrumDAO.org
- LinkedIn https://www.linkedin.com/company/scrumdao
- Twitter twitter.com/scrum_dao

column16:
WAGMI LatAm is an initiative that aims to increase female participation in the Web3 field in Latin America. Our objective is to add 5 million Latin American women to the Web3 space by 2030. We have three main lines of action: education (courses), resources (financing and dominions), and empowerment (mentoring and workshops). 

WAGMI LatAm recognizes the importance of working together to break down the barriers that keep women from opportunities to progress and contribute to diversifying the ecosystem. By providing education, resources, and empowerment to Latinas and Latin Americans, the initiative is paving the way for a more egalitarian, democratic, and decentralized future of web3.

In 2022, WAGMI LATAM provided access to over 150 people to gated courses to learn Solidity, NFT's, and other relevant skills for Web3. The initiative also secured 5 million domains to be distributed over the next years to the current 40 communities that make it up. 

For 2023, we are focusing on research by mapping the current challenges faced by women in LATAM who want to join the Web3 space as both users and builders. By identifying the main challenges, the initiative will be able to be more effective with its resources, and this information will also be of great use for its community partners. This research will serve as a baseline comparison to measure the impact WAGMI LATAM has had over the years.

The research is comprised of 2 stages:
1. Surveying active Latin American women in the web3 ecosystem to understand their process to become involved in the ecosystem. 
2. Survey women across 10 countries in the region who are not familiar with the technology and learn more about their digital use and knowledge and understanding of blockchain use cases.

column16:
Ethereum Mexico is a reliable source of information and a driving force for Ethereum adoption and development throughout Mexico. Its mission is to teach individuals about the safe use of blockchain technology while spreading the values of Ethereum and providing the necessary tools to build on Web3. 


As a bridge between the Ethereum ecosystem, the Ethereum Foundation, and other communities in Mexico, Ethereum Mexico adds value to the ecosystem by supporting and assisting local communities in building projects related to Ethereum, hosting and helping other communities and people to host and become speakers in their events.


The organization provides high-value content like IRL Meetups, Twitter Spaces, Workshops, and Community Gatherings. For 2023, Ethereum Mexico has planned numerous initiatives, including workshops and expanding community partnerships. However, the most significant of these initiatives is a large-scale event designed for Q3 of this year in Mexico City, with a capacity of +1,000 people. This event will feature excellent speakers and scholarships for individuals inside and outside Mexico; we‚Äôve seen the power of the scholarships in person, so we want to give that opportunity to the community.


The event's goal is to significantly impact the future of Ethereum's ecosystem by further teaching and inspiring community members to build and develop in the Ethereum ecosystem. 


Ethereum Mexico has participated in #RoadToDevcon and EthLATAM in Bogot√° since June 2022. It aims to continue being a helpful entity that supports and assists local communities throughout Mexico, contributing to the building of communities and new projects related to Ethereum. Far from falling into speculative and market-oriented conversations, Ethereum Mexico is a legitimate interest for individuals to learn about the real power of change that Ethereum brings to the world as public infrastructure.


In addition to our current initiatives, we aim to become a hub for all kinds of crypto enthusiasts sharing the Ethereum vision for the world. We aim to empower individuals to become developers, community managers, founders, web3 lawyers,  or anything they want to become by providing the necessary resources and knowledge.


We envision Ethereum Mexico as an organization that will share all the opportunities that are in the Ethereum Ecosystem with other communities in M√©xico, helping them and mentoring them to make their impact more significant. Us sharing about them as well and sharing about the latest updates that are happening in the ecosystem. We want to keep organizing Ethereum M√©xico as an important Web3 event in the country organized by and for the community. We plan to collaborate closely with the Ethereum Foundation to expand the beautiful ecosystem they have envisioned for new financial infrastructure. We aim to become a leading force in adopting and developing Ethereum in Mexico, promoting the benefits of decentralized technologies and contributing to the growth of a thriving blockchain ecosystem. By doing so, we hope to help shape the future of finance and technology in Mexico and beyond.

Our previous accomplishments include the following:

RoadtoDevcon 2022:
‚àò Organized ten virtual classes, each with over sixty attendees.
‚àò Held three in-person meetups, each with over thirty attendees. 
‚àò Conducted five in-person workshops with a total of over 250 participants.
‚àò Hosted ten Twitter Spaces, with over sixty live attendees and over one hundred tuning in.
‚àò Organized two in-person events in Mexico City, each with over one hundred participants.

Q4 2022:
‚àò Provided volunteer services during ETHBogot√°, ETHLatam, and Devcon.
‚àò Presented as speakers during ETHLatam.
‚àò Contributed as collaborators during Devcon as volunteers, notetakers, and MCs.
‚àò Hosted two Twitter Spaces, with over eighty live attendees and over one hundred tuning in.

Q1 2023:
‚àò We organized one in-person event in Mexico City with over fifty participants.
‚àò We conducted in-person workshops on self-custodial and security in Mexico City, Puebla, M√©rida, and Guadalajara, with just over 150 attendees, inviting other local communities to be part of its organization. 
Our project is important because it aims to address the current gap in education and resources for individuals and communities in Mexico to learn about and participate in the Ethereum ecosystem. This will ultimately lead to a more inclusive and diverse Ethereum community in Mexico and contribute to the overall growth and development of the Ethereum ecosystem.


What‚Äôs next for Ethereum M√©xico?
‚àò Ethereum M√©xico 2023 (IRL Event).
‚àò Scholarships for people inside and outside M√©xico to be able to attend Ethereum M√©xico 2023 or other Ethereum Events across the world.
‚àò An initiative called #BuildersCreateBuilders with Ethereum M√©xico is where we invite developers and more people in the community to be part, to teach their abilities and knowledge focused on the Ethereum Ecosystem to other people, and for them to be inspired and mentored to become builders.
‚àò Helping and guiding other communities and leaders in M√©xico that want to share about Ethereum. 
‚àò Empower individuals to become developers, community managers, founders, web3 lawyers,  or anything they want to become by providing the necessary resources and knowledge.

column15: forthepeoplexyz: good music, good causes, sounds good
column16:
***ForthePeoplexyz***  is a groundbreaking initiative that seeks to harness the power of blockchain technology and digital communities to ***create a music marketplace for social good.***

In today's world, non-profit and grassroots organizations face a plethora of challenges when it comes to securing funding streams. With the ever-changing landscape of the global economy, it is becoming increasingly difficult for these organizations to access the resources they need to carry out their vital work.

Through the "For the People" project, we aim to address this problem by:

1. Creating a new model for ***music distribution*** that is focused on social impact. Our vision is to create a platform that ***connects artists, fans, and social causes*** in a way that allows everyone to benefit. 

 2. Providing a marketplace for socially conscious artists, we hope to create a ***new funding stream for non-profit organizations and grassroots organizations*** while also promoting good music.

3. Curating causes that represent a wide range of issues and communities, and building bridges between different groups of people, thus promote understanding, empathy, and social health.

The project is based on the idea that music is a public good that can be used to drive positive change in the world. By ***leveraging the power of blockchain technology, we can create a transparent and decentralized platform that empowers artists and fans to support social causes that matter to them.*** 

This will help to foster a sense of community and shared purpose that can drive real-world impact. This marketplace will also ***enrich the web3 ecosystem by onboarding new creators, organizers, leaders, builders, problem solvers, disrupters, advocates, change makers, and historically marginalized people.*** 

The platform also aims to be inclusive and diverse, reflecting the values of the artists and music lovers who support it. In this way, the "For the People" platform is not just a fundraising tool, but a community-driven movement for positive change. ***It is a way for people to come together and use their collective power to make a difference in the world, and to create a more just, equitable, and sustainable future for all.*** 

The platform's model of good music for good causes is expected to attract a wide range of individuals and organizations to the web3 ecosystem. 

Firstly, ***music lovers*** who are passionate about social causes and want to make a difference will be drawn to the platform. Secondly, ***non-profit organizations  and grassroots community organizations*** that are looking for new ways to raise funds and awareness will also be interested in the platform. Finally, ***artists who are passionate about social causes and want to use their music as a force for good***will be drawn to the platform.


Overall, the "For the People" project represents an exciting new approach to music distribution and social impact. By ***aligning good music with good causes***, we believe that we can create a powerful force for change in the world. ***We hope that you will join us in supporting this innovative and important initiative.***

', 'type': 'paragraph', 'hidden': True, 'answer': 'Primarily, forthepeoplexyz is committed to web3 education from adoption to immersion for all of the non-profits and grassroots organizations our artists partner with. Our web3 education team is focused on on-boarding from the lens of secure ways to benefit from and contribute to the ecosystem. For us this includes education about on-chain splits protocols and other ways we actualize transparency and decentralization. We also believe that the non-profit, grassroots organizations, and their communities will enrich the ecosystem. 

Secondarily, the marketplace will reward users with $FTP tokens. These tokens will lead to unique experiences or visits to the communities that are impacted by the causes supported by the users, this  will  incentivize users to engage with the platform and earn tokens. They can meet the people who have been helped by the cause, see the impact firsthand, and interact with the local community. This can be a very powerful experience that encourages users to continue to engage but by curating causes that represent a wide range of issues and communities, the platform can help to build bridges between different groups of people, and promote understanding, empathy, and social health.

one of the key aspects of the "For the People" platform is transparency and accountability in the use of funds. To ensure that the funds are being used effectively and efficiently, organizations and beneficiaries will be expected to provide documentation of how the funds were used in the form of video and storytelling.

For example, let's say that a cause supported by the platform is raising funds for a school in a developing country. Once the funds have been raised, the organization responsible for implementing the project will be expected to provide regular updates on the progress of the project. This could include videos and photos of the construction process, interviews with teachers and students, and stories of how the project is impacting the local community.

Similarly, if an artist supported by the platform is using funds to support a music program for underserved youth, they will be expected to provide regular updates on the progress of the program. This could include videos and photos of the students learning and performing music, interviews with the students and their families, and stories of how the program is changing lives.

By providing this kind of documentation, organizations and beneficiaries can demonstrate the impact of the funds raised through the platform, and build trust with the platform's users. This can help to encourage more people to support the platform and its causes, leading to even greater impact over time.

column16:
*A bi-weekly summary of the developments and happenings within ENS, ENS DAO, and its working groups.*

--

The ENS DAO Newsletter started in March 2022 with the objective of providing transparency for ENS and ENS DAO through publication of a bi-weekly newsletter ‚Äì An easy-to-read summary of the latest news, developments, and discussions, designed to reach the *widest audience possible.*

Since then, we have published **33 editions**, and we continue to release new editions on the 1st and 15th of every month.

New editions are available via
- [Substack](https://ensdaonews.substack.com/)
- [ENS DAO Governance Forum](https://discuss.ens.domains/c/dao-wide/newsletter/72)

--

Additionally, through our Translation Initiative, community-sourced translations of each new edition are now published in Chinese, German, Portuguese, and Spanish ‚Äì with even more languages to come as we continue to grow!

Links to subscribe to other language editions can be found on [**our website**](https://ensnews.eth.limo/).

--

The ENS DAO Newsletter editors stay up-to-date with what is happening in ENS and ENS DAO *every single day*, so you don‚Äôt have to. We crawl the forum, bookmark the important tweets, attend the working group calls and Twitter spaces, and ask the important questions to provide our readers with the absolute **best source** of ENS news and information, as it happens.

We provide a carefully curated summary of the latest governance proposals, working group discussions, protocol developments, calls to action, market news, and all other developments within the wider ENS ecosystem.

Subscribers to our [Substack](https://ensdaonews.substack.com/) get the latest editions emailed directly to them every 1st and 15th, for free.

--

All funding goes towards continuing our future operations. Thank you for your time and consideration!

column16:
The Web 3 training course in Russian in images from Russian folk tales was created to help Russian-speaking citizens who are abroad and need to adapt to the new world system. The course is intended for those who want to learn Web 3.0 technologies, blockchain, cryptocurrencies and other aspects of decentralized systems.

A feature of our course is the use of images from Russian folk tales that are understandable to the Russian population to explain the complex concepts of Web 3.0. We believe that this will help students more easily understand technologies that may seem complex and incomprehensible.

The course will be divided into different modules, each of which will contain lectures, exercises and assignments. We will also provide additional materials and resources for students to further explore topics that interest them.

To create the course, we have recruited a team of Web 3.0 and blockchain experts who have in-depth knowledge and experience in this area. We also plan to hold additional events such as webinars and online courses for members who wish to receive additional support and assistance.

Our goal is to help our students learn new technologies and adapt to a changing world system using materials that are understandable and accessible.

column16:
**Introduction**

ReFi by South is a community building project that aims to accelerate climate change mitigation, adaptation, and resilience solutions in the global South through the use of technology, community organizing, and focused collaborations.

By leveraging blockchain technology for collaboration, decentralized governance, and crowdsourced financial models, ReFi by South supports projects, institutions, and entrepreneurs who are working towards climate action in regions where the impacts of the climate crisis are severe and opportunities for solutions are abundant.

For the Gitcoin Beta Round, ReFi by South is proud to present:

‚ÄÉ‚ÄÉ‚ÄÉ‚ÄÉ‚ÄÉ‚ÄÉ           ‚ÄÉ‚ÄÉüê∏üê∏üê∏ **LEAPFROG** üê∏üê∏üê∏

**Helping early stage Web3 and Web2 companies jump into ReFi**

In order to bring this global need to local action, we need to leapfrog Web2 impact projects and Entrepreneurs onto Web3 and accelerate education, funding, and innovation in climate and blockchain. Leapfrog is a programmatic structure with virtual topsoil that will nourish and support the growth of Climate Blockchain projects in the global South.

The goal of the Leapfrog is to enable early stage projects and entrepreneurs to move faster to market and attract collaborations and funding to scale progressively.

**Workshops and Cohorts**

The proceeds from this grant round will be used to conduct a series of workshops aimed at building capacity in the global South. These workshops will cover topics such as

- Building a Web3 Climate project
- Technology connect ( dMRV )
- Marketing ( Socials )
- Interoperability
- Goto Market
- Investor Roundtables
- Funding

Participants would be early stage projects and entrepreneurs from the global south with large potential Climate/social impact.

Going forward the LOA Labs **LEAPFROG** would expand scope to cover

- Specific themed cohorts with a focus on Web2 / Impact changemakers
- Industry / L1 supported POC's across the ReFi Stack
- Demo days
- Seed funding support

This will create an innovation corridor that facilitates cross-pollination of capital, technology transfer, assimilation of indigenous practices, and harmonization of standards and practices across language, code, and tokens in conjunction with the Web2 and Web3 industry. Through the LOA Labs network across multiple L1's, funders, and impact changemakers, projects and entrepreneurs will develop deep roots within the ReFi ecosystem.

**Evaluation and Monitoring:**

To ensure the effectiveness of the project, ReFi by South will implement robust evaluation and monitoring mechanisms. The outcomes of the workshops and the overall impact of the ReFi by South project will be regularly assessed to measure progress and success.

**History & Traction:**

**Your previous support of LOA Labs' ReFi by South has supported**

- ReFi India Summit Dec 01,2022 ( 100+ attendees)
- Roundtables - Jan, Feb 2023 ( Grant roundtable and Investor roundtables)
- Greenpill Festival, Gokarna - March 2023 ( ReFi Hackathon with 100 attendees )
- 15+ Twitter spaces hosted by ReFi Ambassadors across Kenya, Nigeria, Uganda, and Singapore in multiple languages.

**Collaborate for scale**

ReFi by South invites interested projects and entrepreneurs from the global South to sign up for the workshops and contribute to this initiative to scale climate action in the region. Reach out to us on https://twitter.com/refibysouth

With your support, ReFi by South aims to accelerate education, funding, and innovation in climate and blockchain in the global South. By localizing and scaling climate action through technology, community organizing, and collaborations, we can make a tangible and lasting impact on local communities and contribute to global efforts in mitigating climate change.

For more information, please go to refibysouth.com.

column16:
Bu Zhi DAO is a collective of builders passionate about growing the Taiwan web3 ecosystem on the global stage by creating educational resources, hosting conferences, workshops, bootcamps, building tools, and organizing community events. 

We hosted Taipei Blockchain Week in December 2022 with over 2000 attendees, 300+ developers attending bootcamp, and 10+ projects on demo day. We also host talks for students curious about web3 from founders to inspire the next generation of builders from Taiwan. We host online workshops, create podcast in both English and Mandarin, organize various meet ups to bridge with other communities as well.

column16:
**"JPGs Against Humanity" (JPGAH)** is an episodic documentary film series sharing parallels to the popular Netflix show "Chef's Table". This series will specifically target an audience who have little knowledge of web3/NFTs/crypto but who have a love of art/travel/history. The series will dive deep into the emotional stories of NFT artists around the world whose traumas and inner demons have been healed by their participation in web3 communities. Those traumas include mental health issues, socialization difficulties, and financial insecurities.

**Web3 Education Through Art**
Despite the immense strides that have been made in the last few years, many people still view crypto and NFTs through the lens of being a giant ponzi scheme wrought with scams. Words like decentralization, smart contracts, and even blockchain itself are complete gibberish. Even short videos that attempt to explain these terms to people are glossed over because they are presented with assumptions that everyone has basic understanding of technology -- this is not the case. This film series will add much needed context to the web3 space by educating people on these concepts in a subtle manner; that is to say, they'll be wrapped up in stories of art, culture, and history, which are much more digestible and relatable to the average person.

![Stills from EP1 in production](https://www.323productions.com/misc/TRAILER1.jpg)

Everyone can appreciate and relate to stories of art and being able to experience foreign cultures from their couch. This film series will show that crypto and the NFT space is not just butterflies and rainbows -- that behind the curtain are real, deeply flawed humans who desire to make the world a better place through code. It is my mission to educate people about important global issues, but discretely weave them into tales of emotion in which we can feel connected to these individuals who have become evangelists of the artistic renaissance unfolding before us.

![Stills from EP1 in production](https://www.323productions.com/misc/TRAILER2.jpg)

"First-world" countries are typically oblivious to the financial struggles that come with living in less privileged parts of the world. It's been said that as much as 70% of the planet lives in extreme poverty, where the daily income can be as low as $5/day and where these people don't even have access to a bank. For them, the ability to engage with an ecosystem in which a piece of artwork can be sold for $20 and those funds received instantly in a wallet could be life-changing. We MUST do more to educate people about how transformative this can be.

Finally, the idea that this documentary series could be entirely funded through cryptocurrency grants would serve as the ultimate case study proving that digital assets have real world value, as many outsiders naively cling to the belief that tokens like ETH are nothing more than fictional money that cannot be used for any goods and services of substance. We will prove them wrong.

**How Will Funds Be Used?**
Film production at this level is expensive. With each episode, there is crew, airfare/hotels, meals, equipment rentals, lighting, location permits, insurance policies, post-production (editing, music, VFX, graphics) -- just to name a few. A single episode with an expected TRT (total run-time) of 45-50 min could cost about $100-150k USD. We have many scripted ideas, and will pursue as many as possible with the donations and matching funds received.

![Stills from EP1 in production](https://www.323productions.com/misc/TRAILER3.jpg)

**What Makes Me Qualified?**
I am a filmmaker working in the Hollywood film industry. My work in documentaries has earned me 3x Emmy nominations, and I'm a member of the Motion Picture Editors Guild. I've worked with Oscar-nominated producers and many talented individuals who can help guide the acquisition and distribution of this series. And, as an NFT artist myself, I am uniquely positioned on the front lines of this battle to tell the stories of the many vulnerable creators fighting for global adoption. Many of these stories are highly personal and require a deep level of trust, something that an outsider may not have acquired.

column15: Impact DAO Course + IRL/Online Events: Educating Changemakers on How To Impact DAO
column16:
**Goal**

Launch an Impact DAO course to teach changemakers how to start and manage Impact DAOs. Through online education and decentralized events (IRL/online) we aim to grow the Impact DAO movement. We‚Äôre the publishers of [Impact DAO book](https://impactdaos.xyz/) and the podcast, [All About Impact DAOs](https://impactdaos.buzzsprout.com/). 


**Project Deliverables**

-   Design step by step course on how to start and build Impact DAO. Online course with SBT certification + downloadable handbook.
 
-   Build a network of Impact DAO folks (train the trainer model) that serve as advocates, trainers and conductors of IRL/online events in their respective countries. Our goal for the next quarters is to seed these nodes in min 4 emerging DAO countries in Asia and LaTam.
  
-   Weekly Twitter Spaces on How to Impact DAO. We  aim to leverage Ethereum and Regen IRL events to have an Impact DAO focused track.

**Why an Impact DAO Course**

Impact DAOs are the future of organizing for causes. Social impact organizations of tomorrow will be formed on the internet. It's therefore important we equip the changemakers with the right knowledge and tools. Also [our research of 12 mature Impact DAOs](https://impactdaos.xyz/learnings-and-analysis) showed that Impact DAOs are very different from other categories of DAOs. Impact DAOs align around meaning over money and its therefore important we create a custom course on Impact DAOs.

**Why Impact DAO Media**

At Impact DAO Media we‚Äôre committed to cracking the code on effective collaboration on the internet. We invest in research and learning from the builders of current Impact DAOs to unpack the learnings for future DAO builders. We‚Äôre the ultimate source of truth on Impact DAOs and are committed to creating open source knowledge on this emergent DAO category. 

Impact DAO Media was founded with the support of Gitcoin GR14 in June 2022. Since then we've published a book available for free at https://impactdaos.xyz/ and podcast, All About Impact DAOs https://impactdaos.buzzsprout.com/. We're currently underway with our 2nd research of 16 mature impact daos to be soon listed in the Impact DAO book.

column16:
#Cryptonikas

Our Web3 project is a DAO focused on promoting inclusion, diversity, and education within the Hispanic community. Our mission is to empower female Latin content creators by educating 10,000 women about blockchain and AI technologies. We have a proven track record in the Web3 space and have been actively working towards our long-term goals, which include fostering economic opportunities for underrepresented communities and promoting diversity within the industry.

We provide educational resources such as podcasts, newsletters, and blog posts, and are working to create a teach-to-earn no-code tool that enables Hispanic content creators to easily share their projects and monetize using NFTs. Through our platform, we aim to build a community of like-minded individuals who are passionate about blockchain and AI technologies, and we are committed to protecting users by investigating bad actors and promoting user safety.

##Check our content including youtube tutorials, medium articles, podcasts, and more:

[linktr.ee/cryptonikasdao](https://linktr.ee/cryptonikasdao)

column16:
At ai4news, we are passionate about the blockchain and Web3 revolution, and we understand the immense potential that these technologies hold for transforming the world. However, we also recognize that the blockchain space is riddled with scams and fake news, which can pose significant challenges for individuals seeking accurate information.

To address this issue, we have harnessed the power of advanced AI technologies, including machine learning, deep learning, and GPT-4 to meticulously analyze and verify the credibility of news in the blockchain sphere. Our cutting-edge AI-powered solution is specifically designed to identify and filter out fake news, while highlighting valuable and reliable information related to blockchain and Web3 developments.

By using our platform, you can trust that the news you receive is accurate, reliable, and timely, empowering you to make well-informed decisions in the rapidly evolving blockchain landscape. We invite you to join our community by visiting our website at https://ai4news.xyz and following us on Twitter at https://twitter.com/ai4news_xyz. Stay informed with confidence, and together, let's embrace the promising future of blockchain and Web3.

column16:
ProXify DAO is an Education and service DAO that is actively working towards the mass adoption of Web3 in Africa. 
Our mission is to educate, train, and mentor individuals, empowering them to become skilled Web3 technical service providers, and ultimately connecting them to clients who require their services.

In order to achieve this mission, we are creating a comprehensive educational program aimed at onboarding millions of Africans into the Web3 ecosystem. Our program includes detailed and simplified courses on Web3 basics, and technical courses like smart contracts, tokenomics, and more, all available in both English and Pidgin languages to ensure ease of understanding.

Our Alumni program will provide real-time mentoring to students who require assistance, ensuring they are supported throughout their journey. We believe that this program will play a significant role in the Web3 ecosystem by helping to onboard new contributors and fostering greater collaboration and innovation.

We are committed to making a positive impact in the Web3 education space and are confident that our educational program will enable more people to participate in the ecosystem, leading to increased adoption and growth.

column16:
Decentralized Science NYC is a community-driven initiative that aims to democratize the scientific process through IRL monthly meetups. 

Since our inception, we have hosted five events, attracting 50 to 200 attendees each time, highlighting the growing interest in the community. All talks are recorded and made available online (desci.nyc), ensuring that valuable knowledge is shared beyond the event itself.

We are particularly committed to engaging beginners and helping them get excited about the field, providing them with the necessary skills and confidence to contribute to scientific endeavors.

At each event, we provide pizza and soft drinks. We generally secure event spaces for free but need professional cleaners to come in after as a condition. 100% of the money raised will be allocated towards pizza, drinks, and cleaning fees.

As we continue to grow we have several exciting initiatives planned for the future of Decentralized Science NYC:

-Establishing partnerships with local universities, research institutions, and industry experts to foster collaboration and create new opportunities for our members.

-Developing a mentorship program that connects experienced researchers and professionals with newcomers to provide guidance, support, and inspiration.
